trans-unit.source: The Chef Client 12.4 release adds an optional feature to the Microsoft Installer Package (MSI) for Chef. This feature enables the ability to pass quoted strings from the Windows PowerShell command line without the need for triple single quotes (''' '''). This feature installs a Windows PowerShell module (typically in C:\opscode\chef\modules) that is also appended to the PSModulePath environment variable. This feature is not enabled by default. To activate this feature, run the following command from within Windows PowerShell:
trans-unit.target: Chef Client 12.4发行版为Chef的Microsoft安装程序包（MSI）添加了可选功能。此功能使您能够从Windows PowerShell命令行传递带引号的字符串，而无需使用三重单引号（ ''' ''' ）。此功能将安装Windows PowerShell模块（通常在 C:\opscode\chef\modules ），该模块也将附加到 PSModulePath 环境变量中。默认情况下不启用此功能。要激活此功能，请在Windows PowerShell中运行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: The Chef Community Advocates are well informed on how to deal with incidents. Report the incident (preferably in writing) to one of the Community Advocates listed in the Roles section.
trans-unit.target: 厨师社区倡导者非常了解如何处理事件。向“角色”部分列出的社区倡导者之一报告事件（最好以书面形式）。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Compliance Pattern
trans-unit.target: 厨师合规模式

trans-unit.source: The Chef Compliance Remediation Pattern
trans-unit.target: 厨师合规整治模式

trans-unit.source: The Chef Compliance pattern has two components. The first is the Chef Habitat plan.sh or plan.ps1 file that you will use to invoke the Chef Compliance premium scan and remediation profiles. The second part of the pattern in the config.yaml file that you will use for customizing the Chef Compliance profile.
trans-unit.target: 厨师合规性模式有两个组成部分。第一个是Chef Habitat plan.sh 或 plan.ps1 文件，您将使用该文件来调用Chef Compliance高级扫描和补救配置文件。 config.yaml 文件中模式的第二部分，将用于自定义Chef Compliance配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Desktop Development Pattern
trans-unit.target: 厨师桌面开发模式

trans-unit.source: The Chef Desktop cookbook installs onto your development environment. Once configured and tested, you then upload the Chef Desktop cookbook to your Chef Infra Server. From there, you deliver the Chef Desktop cookbook to your managed devices by adding the cookbook to the runlist in one of your Policyfiles. Like the Chef Desktop cookbook, you edit the Policyfiles for your Windows and macOS devices in your development environment and upload them to the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: Chef Desktop烹饪书安装到您的开发环境中。配置和测试后,您就可以将Chef Desktop烹饪手册上传到您的Chef Infra服务器。在那里,您可以通过将cookbook添加到策略文件中的运行列表中,将Chef Desktopcookbook传送到您的受管设备上。与 Chef Desktop 菜谱一样,您可以在开发环境中编辑 Windows 和 macOS 设备的 Policyfiles,并将其上传到 Chef Infra 服务器。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Desktop cookbook provides Windows and macOS desktop administrators a straightforward experience for configuring and managing remote devices without requiring deep command-line knowledge or experience with Ruby or Chef Infra. Administrators can set common configuration options in Chef Desktop cookbook, such as using FileVault or BitLocker drive encryption, and then deploy the configuration to the fleet.
trans-unit.target: Chef Desktop烹饪书为Windows和macOS桌面管理员提供了配置和管理远程设备的直接体验,而不需要深厚的命令行知识或Ruby或Chef Infra的经验。管理员可以在Chef Desktop烹饪书中设置常见的配置选项,例如使用FileVault或BitLocker驱动器加密,然后将配置部署到车队。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Desktop cookbook’s default recipe finds the underlying operating system (OS) and then calls the operating system-specific recipe. Each OS recipe is easy to understand and configure.
trans-unit.target: Chef Desktop食谱的默认配方将找到底层操作系统（OS），然后调用特定于操作系统的配方。每个操作系统配方都易于理解和配置。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Desktop management pattern allows you to manage all your macOS devices using a MicroMDM server for a fully automated experience.
trans-unit.target: Chef桌面管理模式允许您使用MicroMDM服务器管理所有的macOS设备,以获得完全自动化的体验。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Effortless GitHub repository has an example chef-repo for you to explore.
trans-unit.target: Chef Effortless GitHub存储库中有一个Chef-repo示例供您浏览。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Enterprise Application Stack (EAS) allows organizations to automate infrastructure, security, and application delivery together, helping them deploy software quickly while maintaining compliance with industry regulations. Chef EAS helps teams drive efficiency and consistency for any application across multi-cloud and heterogeneous infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Chef Enterprise Application Stack (EAS)允许企业将基础架构、安全和应用交付自动化在一起,帮助他们快速部署软件,同时保持符合行业法规。Chef EAS可帮助团队在多云和异构基础架构中为任何应用提升效率和一致性。

trans-unit.target: Chef Extension 不再能通过 Azure 门户安装。它可以使用其他命令行工具进行安装,例如。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Habitat CLI can be installed on Linux, Mac, and Windows.
trans-unit.target: Chef Habitat CLI可以安装在Linux，Mac和Windows上。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Habitat CLI creates origin key pairs through two different commands, for two different uses:
trans-unit.target: Chef Habitat CLI通过两个不同的命令创建起源密钥对,用于两种不同的用途。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Habitat Pattern Library is an evolving set of design patterns to use as starting-points. These patterns are examples and require configuration and customization for your unique situation.
trans-unit.target: Chef Habitat 模式库是一套不断发展的设计模式,可以作为起点。这些模式是例子,需要根据您的独特情况进行配置和定制。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Habitat Supervisor can be configured to leverage an optional update strategy, which describes how the Supervisor and its peers within a service group should respond when a new version of a package is available.
trans-unit.target: 可以将Chef Habitat Supervisor配置为利用可选的更新策略，该策略描述了新版本的软件包可用时，Supervisor及其服务组中的对等方应如何响应。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Habitat Supervisor is similar in some ways to well-known process supervisors like systemd, runit or smf. It accepts and passes POSIX signals to its child processes, restarts child processes if and when they fail, ensures that children processes terminate cleanly, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 厨师人居主管在某些方面类似于systemd，runit或smf之类的著名流程主管。它接受POSIX信号并将其传递给其子进程，如果它们失败则重新启动子进程，确保子进程干净终止，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Habitat Supervisor performs leader election natively for service group topologies that require one, such as leader-follower.
trans-unit.target: Chef Habitat Supervisor会针对需要一种服务组拓扑（例如Leader-follower）在本地执行领导者选举。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Habitat Supervisor provides a HTTP API to expose cluster metadata, statistics, and general diagnostic information useful for monitoring and support in the form of a JSON document. It also provides detailed information about the Chef Habitat package that it is supervising, including metadata such as the build and runtime dependencies and their versions.
trans-unit.target: Chef Habitat Supervisor提供了一个HTTP API,以JSON文档的形式公开集群元数据、统计数据和对监控和支持有用的一般诊断信息。它还提供了关于它所监督的Chef Habitat包的详细信息,包括构建和运行时依赖关系及其版本等元数据。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Habitat Supervisor uses a defined TCP protocol for all interactions; the hab CLI tool is the client for this protocol, and the Supervisor is the server. Interactions are authenticated using a shared secret.
trans-unit.target: 厨师人居主管对所有交互均使用已定义的TCP协议；该 hab CLI工具是该协议的客户端，并且所述主管是服务器。使用共享机密对交互进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Habitat Supervisor will display output like this:
trans-unit.target: 厨师生境监督员会显示这样的输出。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Habitat Supervisor will install Chef InSpec and execute your profile in a loop. The loop is controlled by two variables: the interval and the splay. The interval is a set time you want InSpec to run and its default is 1800 seconds. The splay is a randomly generated sleep time that prevents a thundering herd problem, or resource starvation scenario, when sending your report to an external server like Chef Automate. The default for the splay is also 1800 seconds. Alternatively, the splay_first_run can be set to wait a random period of time between 0 and the number set for the splay_first_run before running InSpec when your Habitat package is started or updated. The default of the splay_first_run is 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Chef Habitat Supervisor将安装Chef InSpec并循环执行您的配置文件。循环由两个变量控制： interval 和 splay 。该 interval 是您要InSpec运行的设置时间，其默认值为 1800 秒。该 splay 是随机生成的睡眠时间发送报告像厨师自动化外部服务器时防止惊群的问题，还是资源匮乏的情况下，。为默认 splay 也是 1800 年秒钟。或者，可以将 splay_first_run 设置为等待0到 splay_first_run 设置的数字之间的随机时间段在启动或更新人居包时运行InSpec之前。 splay_first_run 的默认值为 0 秒。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Habitat gossip protocol needs to be included as a default exposed port.
trans-unit.target: 需要将Chef Habitat八卦协议作为一个默认的暴露端口。

trans-unit.source: The Chef InSpec CLI can tell you which plugins are available:
trans-unit.target: Chef InSpec CLI可以告诉你哪些插件是可用的。

trans-unit.source: The Chef InSpec DSL is a Ruby DSL for writing audit controls, which includes audit resources that you can invoke.
trans-unit.target: Chef InSpec DSL是一个用于编写审计控制的Ruby DSL,其中包括你可以调用的审计资源。

trans-unit.source: The Chef InSpec DSL is a Ruby based language. This allows you to be flexible with Ruby code in controls:
trans-unit.target: Chef InSpec DSL是一种基于Ruby的语言。这允许你在控件中灵活使用Ruby代码。

trans-unit.source: The Chef InSpec VMware plugin is used to verify the vCenter and ESXi VMware stack.
trans-unit.target: Chef InSpec VMware插件用于验证vCenter和ESXi VMware堆栈。

trans-unit.source: The Chef InSpec command line now offers a new subcommand just for managing plugins.
trans-unit.target: Chef InSpec 命令行现在提供了一个新的子命令,专门用于管理插件。

trans-unit.source: The Chef InSpec interactive shell is a pry based REPL that can be used to quickly run Chef InSpec controls and tests without having to write it to a file. Its functionality is similar to chef-shell as it provides a way to exercise the Chef InSpec DSL, its resources, tests, and plugins without having to create a profile or write a test file. See http://pryrepl.org/ for an introduction to what pry is and what it can do.
trans-unit.target: Chef InSpec交互式外壳是基于撬的REPL，可用于快速运行Chef InSpec控件和测试，而无需将其写入文件。它的功能类似于Chef-shell，因为它提供了一种练习Chef InSpec DSL，其资源，测试和插件的方法，而无需创建配置文件或编写测试文件。有关什么是撬以及它可以做什么的介绍，请参见http://pryrepl.org/。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client Run
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra客户端运行

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client Run Status chart displays a summary of node statuses: failed, successful, or missing, as well as the total node count. The chart changes as you select filters.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra 客户端运行状态图显示节点状态的摘要:失败、成功或丢失,以及总节点数。图表会随着您选择过滤器而改变。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client accesses the Chef Infra Server from the node on which it's installed to get configuration data, performs searches of historical Chef Infra Client run data, and then pulls down the necessary configuration data. After a Chef Infra Client run is finished, the Chef Infra Client uploads updated run data to the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client从安装它的节点上访问Chef Infra Server以获取配置数据,对Chef Infra Client历史运行数据进行搜索,然后调取必要的配置数据。在Chef Infra Client运行结束后,Chef Infra Client会将更新的运行数据上传到Chef Infra服务器。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client binaries are stored in the /opt/chef directory, which requires a minimum of 200MB of disk space. On Windows, the Chef Infra Client binaries can be found in C:\opscode\, and they require a minimum of 600MB of disk space.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client二进制文件存储在 /opt/chef 目录中，该目录至少需要200MB的磁盘空间。在Windows上，Chef Infra Client二进制文件可以在 C:\opscode\ ，并且它们至少需要600MB的磁盘空间。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client caches a template when it is first requested. On each subsequent request for that template, the Chef Infra Client compares that request to the template located on the Chef Infra Server. If the templates are the same, no transfer occurs.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra 客户端在第一次请求时缓存模板。在每次对该模板的后续请求中,Chef Infra Client会将该请求与位于Chef Infra服务器上的模板进行比较。如果模板相同,则不会发生传输。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client can be run as a daemon. Use the Chef Infra Client cookbook to configure the Chef Infra Client as a daemon. Add the default recipe to a node’s run-list, and then use attributes in that cookbook to configure the behavior of the Chef Infra Client. For more information about these configuration options, see the Chef Infra Client cookbook repository on github.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client可以作为守护程序运行。使用Chef Infra Client Cookbook将Chef Infra Client配置为守护程序。将 default 配方添加到节点的运行列表，然后使用该食谱中的属性来配置Chef Infra Client的行为。有关这些配置选项的更多信息，请参阅github上的Chef Infra Client cookbook存储库。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client can be used to manage role data using the command line and JSON files (that contain a hash, the elements of which are added as role attributes). In addition, the run_list setting allows roles and/or recipes to be added to the role.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client可用于使用命令行和JSON文件（包含哈希，其元素作为角色属性添加）来管理角色数据。另外， run_list 设置允许将角色和/或配方添加到角色。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client created its private key successfully.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra客户端成功创建了自己的私钥。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client encountered an error and was unable to load node data from the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra客户端遇到错误,无法从Chef Infra服务器加载节点数据。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client encountered an error and was unable to register with the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra 客户端遇到错误,无法向 Chef Infra 服务器注册。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client executable can be run as a daemon.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client可执行文件可以作为守护进程运行。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client executable is run as a command-line tool.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client可执行文件是作为命令行工具运行的。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client failed to expand the run-list.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra客户端未能扩展运行列表。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client failed to pull down the cookbook collection from the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra 客户端未能从 Chef Infra 服务器中调取食谱集。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client has specific components that are designed to support unique aspects of the Microsoft Windows platform, including PowerShell, PowerShell DSC, and Internet Information Services (IIS).
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client具有特定的组件,这些组件被设计用来支持Microsoft Windows平台的独特方面,包括PowerShell、PowerShell DSC和Internet信息服务(IIS)。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client has the same system requirements on the AIX platform as any other platform, with the following notes:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client在AIX平台上具有与其他任何平台相同的系统要求，并带有以下注意事项：

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client has the same system requirements on the AIX platform as any other platform, with the following notes:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client在AIX平台上具有与其他任何平台相同的系统要求，并带有以下注意事项：

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client includes two knife commands for managing SSL certificates:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra 客户端包括两个管理 SSL 证书的刀具命令。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client installer puts everything into a unique directory (/opt/chef/) so that Chef Infra Client will not interfere with other applications that may be running on the target machine. Once installed, Chef Infra Client requires a few more configuration steps before it can perform its first Chef Infra Client run on a node.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client安装程序会将所有内容放入一个唯一的目录（ /opt/chef/ ）中，以便Chef Infra Client不会干扰目标计算机上可能正在运行的其他应用程序。安装后，Chef Infra Client需要执行一些配置步骤，才能执行在节点上运行的第一个Chef Infra Client。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client installer will detect the version of the operating system, and then install the appropriate Chef Infra Client version using a single command to install Chef Infra Client and all of its dependencies, including an embedded version of Ruby, OpenSSL, parsers, libraries, and command line utilities.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client安装程序将检测操作系统的版本,然后使用单个命令安装相应的Chef Infra Client版本,安装Chef Infra Client及其所有的依赖项,包括嵌入版本的Ruby、OpenSSL、解析器、库和命令行实用程序。

trans-unit.target: Chef Infra 客户端正试图创建一个私人密钥,以便注册到 Chef Infra 服务器。

trans-unit.target: Chef Infra客户端正在尝试同步命名的烹饪书。

trans-unit.target: Chef Infra客户端已经完成了删除cookbook和/或cookbook文件。

trans-unit.target: Chef Infra客户端没有在Chef Infra服务器上注册,因为它已经有了私钥,或者它不需要私钥。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client may need to be run with elevated privileges in order to get a recipe to converge correctly. On UNIX and UNIX-like operating systems this can be done by running the command as root. On Microsoft Windows this can be done by running the command prompt as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra 客户端可能需要以高权限运行,以使配方正确收敛。在 UNIX 和類似 UNIX 的作業系統上,可以以 root 身份執行指令。在 Microsoft Windows 上,可以以管理员身份运行命令提示符来完成。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client may now be used to configure nodes that are running on the AIX platform, versions 7.1 (TL5 SP2 or higher, recommended) and 7.2. The service resource supports starting, stopping, and restarting services that are managed by System Resource Controller (SRC), as well as managing all service states with BSD-based init systems.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client现在可以用于配置在AIX平台7.1版（建议使用TL5 SP2或更高版本）和7.2上运行的节点。该服务资源支持启动，停止和重新启动由系统资源控制器（SRC），以及管理所有的服务状态与基于BSD的init系统管理服务。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client uses Erubis for templates, which is a fast, secure, and extensible implementation of embedded Ruby. Erubis should be familiar to members of the Ruby on Rails, Merb, or Puppet communities. For more information about Erubis, see: http://www.kuwata-lab.com/erubis/.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client使用Erubis作为模板，这是嵌入式Ruby的快速，安全和可扩展的实现。Ruby on Rails，Merb或Puppet社区的成员应该熟悉Erubis。有关Erubis的更多信息，请参见：http ://www.kuwata-lab.com/erubis/ 。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client uses Ruby as its reference language for creating cookbooks and defining recipes, with an extended DSL for specific resources. A reasonable set of resources are available to the Chef Infra Client, enough to support many of the most common infrastructure automation scenarios; however, this DSL can also be extended when additional resources and capabilities are required.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client使用Ruby作为其创建食谱和定义食谱的参考语言,并为特定资源提供扩展DSL。一套合理的资源可供Chef Infra Client使用,足以支持许多最常见的基础设施自动化场景;但是,当需要额外的资源和功能时,也可以扩展这个DSL。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client uses a lock file to ensure that only one Chef Infra Client run is in progress at any time. A lock file is created at the start of a Chef Infra Client run and is deleted at the end of a Chef Infra Client run. A new Chef Infra Client run looks for the presence of a lock file and, if present, will wait for that lock file to be deleted. The location of the lock file can vary by platform.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client使用锁文件来确保任何时候只有一个Chef Infra Client运行在进行中。锁定文件在Chef Infra Client运行开始时创建,在Chef Infra Client运行结束时删除。新的Chef Infra Client运行会寻找锁文件的存在,如果存在,将等待锁文件被删除。锁定文件的位置可能因平台而异。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client uses the EN_US (UTF-8) character set. By default, the AIX base operating system does not include the EN_US (UTF-8) character set and it must be installed prior to installing the Chef Infra Client. The EN_US (UTF-8) character set may be installed from the first disc in the AIX media or may be copied from /installp/ppc/*EN_US* to a location on the logical partition (LPAR). This topic assumes this location to be /tmp/rte.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Client使用EN_US（UTF-8）字符集。缺省情况下，AIX基本操作系统不包括EN_US（UTF-8）字符集，并且必须在安装Chef Infra Client之前安装它。EN_US（UTF-8）字符集可以从AIX介质中的第一张光盘安装，也可以从 /installp/ppc/*EN_US* 复制到逻辑分区（LPAR）上的某个位置。本主题假定此位置为 /tmp/rte 。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Client will run a recipe only when asked. When the Chef Infra Client runs the same recipe more than once, the results will be the same system state each time. When a recipe is run against a system, but nothing has changed on either the system or in the recipe, the Chef Infra Client won't change anything.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra 客户端只有在被要求时才会运行一个配方。当Chef Infra Client运行同一配方不止一次时,每次的结果将是相同的系统状态。当配方针对系统运行,但系统或配方中没有任何变化时,Chef Infra Client不会改变任何东西。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server
trans-unit.target: 厨师红外服务器

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server 14 upgrade does not reindex existing external Elasticsearch installations.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server 14升级不会重新索引现有的外部Elasticsearch安装。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server 14 upgrade process requires downtime for stopping the server, installing the new package, and then upgrading the server, which will include an automatic Elasticsearch reindexing operation for existing Solr users. We estimate the reindexing operation will take 2 minutes for each 1000 nodes, but the it could take more time, depending on your server hardware and the complexity of your Chef data.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server 14升级过程需要停机,用于停止服务器,安装新的软件包,然后升级服务器,其中将包括对现有Solr用户进行Elasticsearch自动重新索引操作。我们估计每1000个节点的重新索引操作需要2分钟,但可能需要更多的时间,这取决于您的服务器硬件和Chef数据的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server API can be used to create and manage roles directly, although using knife and/or the Chef management console is the most common way to manage roles.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server API可以直接用于创建和管理角色,尽管使用刀和/或Chef管理控制台是管理角色的最常见方式。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server API has the following requirements:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server API有以下要求。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server API is a REST API that provides access to objects on the Chef Infra Server, including nodes, environments, roles, users, organizations, cookbooks (and cookbook versions), and is used to manage an API client list and the associated RSA public key-pairs.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server API是一个REST API,它提供了对Chef Infra服务器上的对象的访问,包括节点、环境、角色、用户、组织、cookbook(和cookbook版本),并用于管理API客户端列表和相关的RSA公钥对。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server MUST NOT use a network file system of any type—virtual or physical—for backend storage. The Chef Infra Server database operates quickly. The behavior of operations, such as the writing of log files, will be unpredictable when run over a network file system.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server不得将任何类型的网络文件系统（虚拟或物理）用于后端存储。Chef Infra Server数据库可以快速运行。在网络文件系统上运行时，操作的行为（例如，日志文件的写入）将是不可预测的。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server acts as a hub for configuration data. The Chef Infra Server stores cookbooks, the policies that are applied to nodes, and metadata that describes each registered node that is being managed by Chef Infra Client. Nodes use Chef Infra Client to ask the Chef Infra Server for configuration details, such as recipes, templates, and file distributions.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器作为配置数据的枢纽。Chef Infra Server存储食谱、应用于节点的策略以及描述每个被Chef Infra Client管理的注册节点的元数据。节点使用Chef Infra Client向Chef Infra Server询问配置细节,如食谱、模板和文件分发。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server acts as a hub for configuration data. The Chef Infra Server stores cookbooks, the policies that are applied to nodes, and metadata that describes each registered node that is being managed by Chef Infra Client. Nodes use Chef Infra Client to ask the Chef Infra Server for configuration details, such as recipes, templates, and file distributions. Chef Infra Client then does as much of the configuration work as possible on the nodes themselves (and not on the Chef Infra Server). This scalable approach distributes the configuration effort throughout the organization.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器作为配置数据的枢纽。Chef Infra Server存储食谱、应用于节点的策略以及描述每个被Chef Infra Client管理的注册节点的元数据。节点使用Chef Infra Client向Chef Infra Server询问配置细节,如食谱、模板和文件分布。然后Chef Infra Client在节点本身(而不是在Chef Infra服务器上)尽可能多地完成配置工作。这种可扩展的方法将配置工作分布在整个组织中。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server acts as a hub of information. Cookbooks and policy settings are uploaded to the Chef Infra Server by users from workstations. (Policy settings may also be maintained from the Chef Infra Server itself, via the Chef management console web user interface.)
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra 服务器作为一个信息枢纽。Cookbook和策略设置由用户从工作站上传到Chef Infra服务器。(政策设置也可以通过Chef管理控制台网络用户界面从Chef Infra服务器本身进行维护)。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server backend HA cluster includes a command-line utility named chef-backend-ctl. This command-line tool is used to manage the Chef Infra Server backend HA cluster, start and stop individual services, and tail Chef Infra Server log files.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server 后台 HA 群集包括一个名为 chef-backend-ctl 的命令行工具。此命令行工具用于管理 Chef Infra Server 后台 HA 群集,启动和停止单个服务,并跟踪 Chef Infra Server 日志文件。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server backend HA cluster includes a command-line utility named chef-backend-ctl. This command-line tool is used to manage the Chef Infra Server backend HA cluster, start and stop individual services, and tail Chef Infra Server log files. For more information, see the chef-backend-ctl documentation.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server后端HA群集包括一个名为Chef-backend-ctl的命令行实用程序。此命令行工具用于管理Chef Infra Server后端HA群集，启动和停止单个服务以及尾随Chef Infra Server日志文件。有关更多信息，请参阅chef-backend-ctl文档。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server can be configured to use SSL certificates by adding the following settings to the server configuration file:
trans-unit.target: 通过在服务器配置文件中添加以下设置,可以将Chef Infra服务器配置为使用SSL证书。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server can be configured via the /etc/opscode/chef-server.rb file. Whenever this file is modified, the chef-server-ctl reconfigure command must be run to apply the changes. See the Chef Infra Server settings guide for additional information.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过 /etc/opscode/chef-server.rb 文件配置Chef Infra服务器。每当修改此文件时，都必须运行 chef-server-ctl reconfigure 命令以应用更改。有关其他信息，请参见Chef Infra Server设置指南。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server can be configured via the /etc/opscode/chef-server.rb file. Whenever this file is modified, the chef-server-ctl reconfigure command must be run to apply the changes. See the Chef Infra Server settings guide for additional information.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过 /etc/opscode/chef-server.rb 文件配置Chef Infra服务器。每当修改此文件时，都必须运行 chef-server-ctl reconfigure 命令以应用更改。有关其他信息，请参见Chef Infra Server设置指南。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server can be configured via the /etc/opscode/chef-server.rb file. Whenever this file is modified, the chef-server-ctl reconfigure command must be run to apply the changes. See the Chef Infra Server settings guide for additional information.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过 /etc/opscode/chef-server.rb 文件配置Chef Infra服务器。每当修改此文件时，都必须运行 chef-server-ctl reconfigure 命令以应用更改。有关其他信息，请参见Chef Infra Server设置指南。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server can operate in a high availability configuration that provides automated load balancing and failover for stateful components in the system architecture.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器可以在高可用性配置中运行,为系统架构中的有状态组件提供自动负载均衡和故障转移。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server can operate in a high availability configuration that provides automated load balancing and failover for stateful components in the system architecture. This type of configuration typically splits the servers into two segments: The backend cluster, and the frontend group.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器可以在高可用性配置中运行,为系统架构中的有状态组件提供自动负载平衡和故障切换。这种类型的配置通常将服务器分成两个部分。后端集群和前端组。

trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server可以重新生成它们。这些证书将位于 /var/opt/opscode/nginx/ca/ ，并将以Chef Infra Server的FQDN命名。要确定服务器的FQDN，请运行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server configuration file is updated to point to an independently configured set of servers for PostgreSQL.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server 配置文件更新为指向独立配置的 PostgreSQL 服务器集。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server decrypts this header and ensures its content matches the content of the non-encrypted headers that were in the request. The timestamp of the message is checked to ensure the request was received within a reasonable amount of time. One approach generating the signed headers is to use mixlib-authentication, which is a class-based header signing authentication object similar to the one used by Chef Infra Client.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server解密此标头，并确保其内容与请求中未加密标头的内容匹配。检查消息的时间戳，以确保在合理的时间内收到了请求。生成签名标头的一种方法是使用mixlib-authentication，这是一个基于类的标头签名认证对象，类似于Chef Infra Client使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server environment in which this node should exist (or does exist).
trans-unit.target: 这个节点应该存在(或确实存在)的 Chef Infra Server 环境。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server has a built in process supervisor, which ensures that all of the required services are in the appropriate state at any given time. The supervisor starts two processes per service.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server有一个内置的进程监督器,它可以确保所有所需服务在任何时间都处于适当的状态。进程监督器为每个服务启动两个进程。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server has built-in support for easily tailing the logs that are generated. To view all the logs being generated on the Chef Infra Server, enter the following command:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器内置支持轻松跟踪生成的日志。要查看Chef Infra服务器上正在生成的所有日志,输入以下命令。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server has the following prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器有以下先决条件。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server includes a command-line utility named chef-server-ctl. This command-line tool is used to start and stop individual services, reconfigure the Chef Infra Server, run chef-pedant, and then tail Chef Infra Server log files.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器包括一个名为chef-server-ctl的命令行工具。这个命令行工具用于启动和停止单个服务,重新配置Chef Infra服务器,运行chef-pedant,然后跟踪Chef Infra服务器的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server includes the following default groups:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra 服务器包括以下默认组。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server includes the following global permissions:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器包括以下全局权限。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server includes the following object permissions:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器包括以下对象权限。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server is accessed primarily by nodes that are under management by Chef, as Chef Infra Client runs occur. It is also accessed by individuals who maintain cookbooks and policy that is stored on the Chef Infra Server, typically from a workstation. And also by individual users with credentials to Chef Infra Server components, such as the Chef management console.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器主要由Chef管理的节点访问,因为Chef Infra客户端运行。它也被维护存储在Chef Infra服务器上的cookbook和策略的个人访问,通常是从工作站访问。而且还由拥有Chef Infra Server组件(如Chef管理控制台)凭证的个人用户访问。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server itself is highly scalable. A single virtual machine running the Chef Infra Server can handle requests for many thousands of nodes. As the scale increases, it’s a straightforward process to expand into a tiered front-end, back-end architecture with horizontally scaled front-ends to relieve pressure on system bottlenecks.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server本身具有高度可扩展性。运行Chef Infra Server的单个虚拟机可以处理数千个节点的请求。随着规模的扩大，扩展到具有水平缩放前端的分层前端，后端体系结构以减轻系统瓶颈的压力是一个简单的过程。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server may contain multiple organizations.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器可能包含多个组织。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server requires an x86_64 compatible systems architecture. When the Chef Infra Server is installed on Red Hat Enterprise Linux or CentOS, run yum update prior to installing the Chef Infra Server. This will ensure those platforms are fully compatible with this requirement.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server需要x86_64兼容的系统架构。在Red Hat Enterprise Linux或CentOS上安装Chef Infra Server时，请在安装Chef Infra Server之前运行 yum update 。这将确保这些平台完全符合此要求。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server requires that the systems on which it is running be connected to Network Time Protocol (NTP), as the Chef Infra Server is particularly sensitive to clock drift. For Red Hat and CentOS 6:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra 服务器要求其运行的系统必须连接到网络时间协议 (NTP),因为 Chef Infra 服务器对时钟漂移特别敏感。对于Red Hat和CentOS 6。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server server requires that every node that is under management by Chef also have an accurate clock that is synchronized very closely with the clock on the Chef Infra Server. If the clocks are not synchronized closely, the authentication process may fail when the clocks are out-of-sync by more than 15 minutes. A failure will trigger a 401 Unauthorized response similar to:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server服务器要求Chef所管理的每个节点还具有准确的时钟，该时钟必须与Chef Infra Server上的时钟非常紧密地同步。如果时钟未紧密同步，则当时钟不同步超过15分钟时，身份验证过程可能会失败。失败将触发 401 Unauthorized 响应，类似于：

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server server uses email to send notifications for various events:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server服务器使用电子邮件来发送各种事件的通知。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server services must be online for the entire duration of the backup.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server 服务必须在整个备份期间在线。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server supports Active Directory and LDAP authentication, which enables users to log in to the Chef Infra Server using their corporate credential and the Manage interface. Without the Manage interface add-on installed, there is no need to enable the Chef Infra Server LDAP functionality. LDAP is not used with Supermarket logins, nor with any Chef Infra Client related authentication.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器支持Active Directory和LDAP认证,这使得用户能够使用他们的企业凭证和Manage接口登录Chef Infra服务器。如果没有安装Manage接口插件,就不需要启用Chef Infra Server LDAP功能。LDAP不用于超市登录,也不用于任何与Chef Infra客户端相关的认证。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server supports using Active Directory or LDAP for any user that has an email address in the LDAP directory. This allows those users to log in to the Chef Infra Server by using their corporate credentials instead of having a separate username and password.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器支持对任何在LDAP目录中拥有电子邮件地址的用户使用活动目录或LDAP。这允许这些用户使用他们的公司凭证登录Chef Infra服务器,而不是拥有单独的用户名和密码。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server user interface uses the Chef Infra Server API to perform most operations. This ensures that authentication requests to the Chef Infra Server are authorized. This authentication process is handled automatically and is not something that users of the hosted Chef Infra Server will need to manage. For the on-premises Chef Infra Server, the authentication keys used by the web interface will need to be maintained by the individual administrators who are responsible for managing the server.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server用户界面使用Chef Infra Server API来执行大多数操作。这确保了对Chef Infra服务器的认证请求得到授权。这个认证过程是自动处理的,不需要托管的Chef Infra服务器的用户来管理。对于内部的Chef Infra服务器,Web界面使用的认证密钥将需要由负责管理服务器的个别管理员维护。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server uses organizations, groups, and users to define role-based access control:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server使用组织、组和用户来定义基于角色的访问控制。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server uses role-based access control (RBAC) to restrict access to objects—nodes, environments, roles, data bags, cookbooks, and so on. This ensures that only authorized user and/or Chef Infra Client requests to the Chef Infra Server are allowed. Access to objects on the Chef Infra Server is fine-grained, allowing access to be defined by object type, object, group, user, and organization. The Chef Infra Server uses permissions to define how a user may interact with an object, after they have been authorized to do so.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server使用基于角色的访问控制（RBAC）来限制对对象（节点，环境，角色，数据包，菜谱等）的访问。这样可以确保仅允许对Chef Infra Server的授权用户和/或Chef Infra Client请求。对Chef Infra Server上的对象的访问是细粒度的，允许根据对象类型，对象，组，用户和组织来定义访问。Chef Infra Server使用权限来定义用户被授权进行对象交互后如何与其进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server uses role-based access control to define the organizations, groups, and users, including those needed by Chef Push Jobs.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server使用基于角色的访问控制来定义组织，组和用户，包括Chef Push Jobs所需的组织，组和用户。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server will only try to distribute the cookbooks that are needed to configure an individual node. This is determined by identifying the roles and recipes that are assigned directly to that system, and then to expand the list of dependencies, and then to deliver that entire set to the node. In some cases, if the dependency is not specified in the cookbook’s metadata, the Chef Infra Server may not treat that dependency as a requirement, which will result in an error message. If an error message is received from the Chef Infra Server about cookbook distribution, verify the depends entries in the metadata.rb file, and then try again.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra Server将仅尝试分发配置单个节点所需的食谱。通过确定直接分配给该系统的角色和配方，然后展开依赖关系列表，然后将整个集合传递给该节点，可以确定这一点。在某些情况下，如果未在食谱的元数据中指定依赖项，则Chef Infra Server可能不会将该依赖项视为要求，这将导致错误消息。如果从Chef Infra Server收到有关分发菜谱的错误消息，请验证metas.rb文件中的 depends 条目，然后重试。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server will provide signed URLs for cookbook requests made by the various clients (individual users, knife requests, and from the Chef Infra Client that is installed on nodes under management by Chef).
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器将为各种客户端(个人用户、小刀请求以及来自安装在Chef管理的节点上的Chef Infra客户端)提出的烹饪书请求提供签名的URL。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra Server will return something similar to:
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器将返回类似的东西。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra bootstrap process is validatorless by default. If you receive a warning during a bootstrap that a validator key is in use, remove the configuration for this legacy bootstrap mode. Edit your config.rb (knife.rb) file and remove any validation_key or validation_client_name entries.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Chef Infra引导程序过程没有验证程序。如果在引导过程中收到警告，提示您正在使用验证密钥，请删除此旧式引导模式的配置。编辑您的config.rb（knife.rb）文件，并删除所有 validation_key 或 validation_client_name 条目。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Infra tool uses the same word to describe its parameterization system.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra工具使用相同的词来描述其参数化系统。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Push Jobs client can be configured using a push-jobs cookbook, but Chef Infra Client must also be present on the node. Only Chef Infra Client can use a cookbook to configure a node.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用Push- Jobs Cookbook配置Chef Push Jobs客户端，但是该节点上还必须存在Chef Infra Client。只有Chef Infra Client可以使用食谱来配置节点。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Push Jobs client is used to receive job messages from the Chef Push Jobs server and to verify the heartbeat status. The Chef Push Jobs client uses the same authorization / authentication model as Chef Infra Client. The Chef Push Jobs client listens for heartbeat messages from the Chef Push Jobs server. If there is no heartbeat from the Chef Push Jobs server, the Chef Push Jobs client will finish its current job, but then stop accepting any new jobs until the heartbeat from the Chef Push Jobs server resumes.
trans-unit.target: Chef Push Jobs客户端用于接收来自Chef Push Jobs服务器的作业消息并验证心跳状态。Chef Push Jobs 客户端使用与 Chef Infra 客户端相同的授权/认证模型。Chef Push Jobs 客户端监听来自 Chef Push Jobs 服务器的心跳消息。如果没有来自Chef Push Jobs服务器的心跳,Chef Push Jobs客户端将完成其当前作业,但随后停止接受任何新作业,直到来自Chef Push Jobs服务器的心跳恢复。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Push Jobs executable can be run as a command-line tool.
trans-unit.target: Chef Push Jobs可执行文件可以作为命令行工具运行。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Push Jobs feature of the Chef Infra Server use the same user and group accounts as the Chef Infra Server.
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器的Chef Push Jobs功能使用与Chef Infra服务器相同的用户和组账户。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Push Jobs server is used to send job messages to one (or more) managed nodes and also to manage the list of jobs that are available to be run against nodes.
trans-unit.target: Chef Push Jobs服务器用于向一个(或多个)受管节点发送作业消息,也用于管理可针对节点运行的作业列表。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Push Jobs service adds the push_jobs service.
trans-unit.target: Chef Push Jobs服务添加了push_jobs服务。

trans-unit.target: 厨师服务器

trans-unit.target: 厨师软件栈

trans-unit.source: The Chef Supermarket installations that are done using the Chef installer include a command-line utility named supermarket-ctl. This command-line tool is used to start and stop individual services, reconfigure the Chef Supermarket server, run smoke tests, and tail the Chef Supermarket log files.
trans-unit.target: 使用Chef安装程序完成的Chef超市安装包括一个名为supermarket-ctl的命令行工具。这个命令行工具用于启动和停止单个服务,重新配置Chef Supermarket服务器,运行烟雾测试,并跟踪Chef Supermarket日志文件。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Supermarket omnibus package does not log Ruby on Rails messages by default. To enable debug logging, edit the /opt/supermarket/embedded/service/supermarket/config/environments/production.rb file and set the config.log_level setting to :debug:

trans-unit.target: Chef Supermarket软件包本身包含一个内部食谱，该食谱使用 /etc/supermarket/supermarket.json 中定义的属性来配置已安装的软件包。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Supermarket server must be able to reach (via HTTPS) the specified chef_server_url during OAuth 2.0 negotiation. This type of issue is typically with name resolution and firewall rules.
trans-unit.target: 在OAuth 2.0协商期间，Chef超市服务器必须能够（通过HTTPS）到达指定的 chef_server_url 。这种类型的问题通常与名称解析和防火墙规则有关。

trans-unit.target: 厨师工作站应用程序(CWA)是一个早期发布的桌面应用程序,为厨师工作站提供额外的服务。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Workstation includes other command line tools for interacting with Chef Infra. These include knife for interacting with the Chef Infra Server, and chef for interacting with your local chef code repository (chef-repo).
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation包括其他命令行工具,用于与Chef Infra互动。其中包括用于与Chef Infra服务器交互的刀子,以及用于与本地Chef代码库(chef-repo)交互的厨师。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Workstation installer must run as a privileged user.
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation 安装程序必须以特权用户的身份运行。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Workstation package conflicts with an installed ChefDK package to prevent unintentional upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 厨师工作站软件包与已安装的ChefDK软件包冲突,以防止无意中的升级。

trans-unit.source: The Chef Workstation ships with the latest release of the chef-vault gem.
trans-unit.target: Chef Workstation随附了最新版本的 chef-vault 宝石。

trans-unit.source: The Chef community contains a diverse group of professionals and volunteers who come from all over the world to make Chef better. Community members may fulfill many roles including mentoring, teaching, and connecting with other members of the community.
trans-unit.target: 廚師社區包含了來自世界各地的專業人士和志願者,他們為了讓廚師變得更好。社区成员可以完成许多角色,包括指导,教学,并与社区的其他成员联系。

trans-unit.source: The Chef community is an active, caring, wickedly smart, and fast growing group of practitioners who want to help you succeed with Chef. There are a number of ways for you to engage with, learn from, follow, and contribute, such as reading books, going to meetups, listening to podcasts, taking some training, and simply being a part of the community.
trans-unit.target: 厨师社区是一个活跃的、有爱心的、邪恶的、聪明的、快速成长的从业者群体,他们希望帮助你用厨师取得成功。你可以通过多种方式参与、学习、跟随和贡献,比如阅读书籍、参加见面会、听播客、参加一些培训,以及简单地成为社区的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The Chef development kit can be uninstalled using the steps below that are appropriate for the platform on which the Chef development kit is installed.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下适合安装Chef开发包的平台的步骤来卸载Chef开发包。

trans-unit.source: The Chef development kit is a package that contains everything that is needed to start using Chef:
trans-unit.target: Chef开发包是一个包含开始使用Chef所需的一切的包。

trans-unit.source: The Chef environment of the data if storing per environment values.
trans-unit.target: 如果存储每个环境值,数据的Chef环境。

trans-unit.source: The Chef installer includes everything necessary to get started with Chef Automate and Chef Habitat Builder on-prem. Bootstrapping Chef Habitat Builder requires:
trans-unit.target: Chef安装程序包含了开始使用Chef Automate和Chef Habitat Builder on-prem所需的一切。Bootstrapping Chef Habitat Builder 需要:

trans-unit.source: The Chef installer will search the PATH for a gem command rather than defaulting to the current gem environment. As part of enforce_path_sanity, the bin directories area added to the PATH, which means when there are no other proceeding RubyGems, the installation will still be operated against it.
trans-unit.target: Chef安装程序将在 PATH 中搜索gem命令，而不是默认使用当前的gem环境。作为 enforce_path_sanity 一部分，将 bin 目录区域添加到 PATH ，这意味着当没有其他进行中的RubyGems时，仍将对其进行安装。

trans-unit.source: The Chef management console add-on can be used to create, edit, view, list, tag, and delete nodes. In addition, node attributes can be modified and nodes can be moved between environments.
trans-unit.target: Chef管理控制台插件可用于创建、编辑、查看、列表、标记和删除节点。此外,还可以修改节点属性,并在环境之间移动节点。

trans-unit.source: The Chef management console add-on can be used to create, edit, view, list, tag, and delete roles. In addition, role attributes can be modified and roles can be moved between environments.
trans-unit.target: Chef管理控制台附加组件可用于创建、编辑、查看、列表、标记和删除角色。此外,角色属性可以修改,角色可以在环境之间移动。

trans-unit.source: The Chef management console enables the management of nodes, data bags, roles, environments, and cookbooks by using a web user interface. In addition, access to nodes, data bags, roles, environments, and cookbooks is configurable using role-based access control (RBAC).
trans-unit.target: Chef管理控制台可以通过使用Web用户界面管理节点、数据袋、角色、环境和cookbook。此外,使用基于角色的访问控制(RBAC)可以配置对节点、数据袋、角色、环境和cookbook的访问。

trans-unit.source: The Chef management console includes a command-line utility named chef-manage-ctl. This command-line tool is used to reconfigure, cleanse (reset the Chef management console to initial configuration settings), and uninstall the Chef management console.
trans-unit.target: Chef管理控制台包括一个名为 chef-manage-ctl 的命令行实用程序。此命令行工具用于重新配置，清理（将Chef管理控制台重置为初始配置设置）以及卸载Chef管理控制台。

trans-unit.source: The Chef management console provides ways for users to delete nodes and reset their private keys, edit node attributes, manage the run-lists, configure user and group permissions, and manage tags.
trans-unit.target: Chef管理控制台为用户提供了删除节点，重置其私钥，编辑节点属性，管理运行列表，配置用户和组权限以及管理标签的方法。

trans-unit.source: The Chef management console provides ways for users to delete nodes and reset their private keys, edit node attributes, manage the run-lists, configure user and group permissions, and manage tags.
trans-unit.target: Chef管理控制台为用户提供了删除节点，重置其私钥，编辑节点属性，管理运行列表，配置用户和组权限以及管理标签的方法。

trans-unit.source: The Chef management console provides ways for users to configure the timeframe around which a report is built, and then to review the reports that are available for that timeframe.
trans-unit.target: Chef管理控制台为用户提供了一种配置报告的时间范围，然后查看可用于该时间范围的报告的方法。

trans-unit.source: The Chef management console provides ways for users to manage data bags, environments, roles, cookbooks, clients, and managing tags.
trans-unit.target: Chef管理控制台为用户提供了管理数据袋，环境，角色，菜谱，客户端和管理标签的方法。

trans-unit.source: The Chef management console provides ways for users to manage data bags, environments, roles, cookbooks, clients, and managing tags.
trans-unit.target: Chef管理控制台为用户提供了管理数据袋，环境，角色，菜谱，客户端和管理标签的方法。

trans-unit.source: The Chef management console uses the Chef server API for all communication to the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: Chef管理控制台使用Chef服务器API与Chef服务器进行所有通信。

trans-unit.source: The Chef node name for your new node
trans-unit.target: 您新节点的Chef节点名称。

trans-unit.source: The Chef provisioner in Test Kitchen >= 2.3 has been updated to simplify accepting this license on behalf of the test instance. Users can set the CHEF_LICENSE environment variable or add chef_license: accept to their provisioner config in their kitchen.yml. Specifying accept will attempt to persist the license acceptance locally. If a local license marker file is detected, no configuration is required; acceptance is automatically transferred to the test instance.
trans-unit.target: 测试厨房> = 2.3中的Chef配置器已更新，以简化代表测试实例接受此许可证的过程。用户可以在其 CHEF_LICENSE 中设置CHEF_LICENSE环境变量或将 chef_license: accept 添加到其预配器配置中。指定接受将尝试在本地保留许可证接受。如果检测到本地许可证标记文件，则无需进行配置；验收将自动转移到测试实例。

trans-unit.source: The Chef push jobs and Reporting premium features of the Chef server use the same user and group accounts as the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器的Chef推送作业和Reporting高级功能使用与Chef服务器相同的用户和组账户。

trans-unit.source: The Chef push jobs service adds the push_jobs service.
trans-unit.target: 厨师推送作业服务添加了push_jobs服务。

trans-unit.source: The Chef reference documentation is located in: https://github.com/chef/chef-web-docs
trans-unit.target: Chef参考文档位于：https : //github.com/chef/chef-web-docs

trans-unit.source: The Chef reference documentation is written using Markdown and built with Hugo.
trans-unit.target: Chef参考文档使用Markdown编写,并使用Hugo构建。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server API has the following requirements:
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器API有以下要求。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server API is a REST API that provides access to objects on the Chef server, including nodes, environments, roles, cookbooks (and cookbook versions), and to manage an API client list and the associated RSA public key-pairs.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器API是一个REST API,它提供了对Chef服务器上对象的访问,包括节点、环境、角色、cookbook(和cookbook版本),以及管理API客户端列表和相关的RSA公钥对。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server API used by the Open Source Chef server does not have an /organizations/ORG_NAME endpoint. Use this setting to ensure that migrated Open Source Chef servers are able to connect to the Chef server API. This value should be the same as the name of the organization that was created during the upgrade from Open Source Chef version 11 to Chef server version 12, which means it will be identical to the ORG_NAME part of the /organizations endpoint in Chef server version 12. Default value: the name of the organization specified during the upgrade process from Open Source Chef 11 to Chef server 12.
trans-unit.target: 开源厨师服务器使用的厨师服务器API没有 /organizations/ORG_NAME 端点。使用此设置可确保迁移的Open Source Chef服务器能够连接到Chef服务器API。此值应与从开放源码Chef版本11升级到Chef服务器版本12时创建的组织名称相同，这意味着它将与Chef服务器版本12中 /organizations 端点的 ORG_NAME 部分相同。默认值：在从Open Source Chef 11到Chef服务器12的升级过程中指定的组织的名称。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server acts as a hub for configuration data. The Chef server stores cookbooks, the policies that are applied to nodes, and metadata that describes each registered node that is being managed by the chef-client. Nodes use the chef-client to ask the Chef server for configuration details, such as recipes, templates, and file distributions. The chef-client then does as much of the configuration work as possible on the nodes themselves (and not on the Chef server). This scalable approach distributes the configuration effort throughout the organization.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器作为配置数据的枢纽。Chef服务器存储了食谱、应用于节点的策略以及描述被chef-client管理的每个注册节点的元数据。节点使用chef-client向Chef服务器询问配置细节,如食谱、模板和文件分布。然后,chef-client在节点本身(而不是在Chef服务器上)尽可能地完成配置工作。这种可扩展的方法将配置工作分布在整个组织中。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server acts as a hub of information. Cookbooks and policy settings are uploaded to the Chef server by users from workstations. (Policy settings may also be maintained from the Chef server itself, via the Chef management console web user interface.)
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器作为一个信息枢纽。Cookbook和政策设置由用户从工作站上传到Chef服务器。(政策设置也可以通过Chef管理控制台网络用户界面从Chef服务器本身进行维护)。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server can operate in a high availability configuration that provides automated load balancing and failover for stateful components in the system architecture. This type of configuration typically splits the servers into two segments: front-end and back-end machines:
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器可以在高可用性配置中运行,为系统架构中的有状态组件提供自动负载均衡和故障转移。这种类型的配置通常将服务器分成两个部分:前端机和后端机。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server can regenerate them. These certificates will be located in /var/opt/opscode/nginx/ca/ and will be named after the FQDN for the Chef server. To determine the FQDN for the server, run the following command:
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器可以重新生成它们。这些证书位于 /var/opt/opscode/nginx/ca/ 并以Chef服务器的FQDN命名。要确定服务器的FQDN，请运行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: The Chef server configuration file is updated to point to an independently configured set of servers for PostgreSQL.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器配置文件更新为指向独立配置的PostgreSQL服务器集。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server decrypts this header and ensures its content matches the content of the non-encrypted headers that were in the request. The timestamp of the message is checked to ensure the request was received within a reasonable amount of time. One approach generating the signed headers is to use mixlib-authentication, which is a class-based header signing authentication object similar to the one used by the chef-client.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器解密此标头，并确保其内容与请求中未加密标头的内容匹配。检查消息的时间戳，以确保在合理的时间内收到了请求。生成签名标头的一种方法是使用mixlib-authentication，这是一个基于类的标头签名认证对象，类似于Chef-client使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server has a built in process supervisor, which ensures that all of the required services are in the appropriate state at any given time. The supervisor starts two processes per service.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器有一个内置的进程监督器,它可以确保所有所需的服务在任何时间都处于适当的状态。进程监督器为每个服务启动两个进程。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server has built-in support for easily tailing the logs that are generated. To view all the logs being generated on the Chef server, enter the following command:
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器内置支持轻松跟踪生成的日志。要查看Chef服务器上正在生成的所有日志,请输入以下命令。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server has the following prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器具有以下先决条件：

trans-unit.source: The Chef server includes a command-line utility named chef-server-ctl. This command-line tool is used to start and stop individual services, reconfigure the Chef server, run chef-pedant, and then tail Chef server log files.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器包括一个名为chef-server-ctl的命令行工具。这个命令行工具用于启动和停止各个服务,重新配置Chef服务器,运行chef-pedant,然后跟踪Chef服务器的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server includes the following default groups:
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器包括以下默认组。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server includes the following global permissions:
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器包括以下全局权限。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server includes the following object permissions:
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器包括以下对象权限。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server is accessed primarily by nodes that are under management by Chef, as the chef-client runs occur. It is also accessed by individuals who maintain cookbooks and policy that is stored on the Chef server, typically from a workstation. And also by individual users with credentials to Chef server components, such as the Chef management console.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器主要由Chef管理的节点访问,因为Chef-客户端的运行发生。它也被维护存储在Chef服务器上的cookbook和策略的个人访问,通常是从工作站访问。而且也由拥有Chef服务器组件(如Chef管理控制台)凭证的个人用户访问。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server is automatically restarted. A prompt is displayed that contains details about how to remove any temporary data that was created during the upgrade process.
trans-unit.target: Chef 服务器自动重新启动。会显示一个提示,包含如何删除升级过程中创建的任何临时数据的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server itself is highly scalable. A single virtual machine running the Chef server can handle requests for many thousands of nodes. As the scale increases, it’s a straightforward process to expand into a tiered front-end, back-end architecture with horizontally scaled front-ends to relieve pressure on system bottlenecks.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器本身具有高度可伸缩性。运行Chef服务器的单个虚拟机可以处理成千上万个节点的请求。随着规模的扩大，扩展到具有水平缩放前端的分层前端，后端体系结构以减轻系统瓶颈的压力是一个简单的过程。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server may contain multiple organizations.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器可能包含多个组织。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server requires an x86_64 compatible systems architecture. When the Chef server is installed on Red Hat Enterprise Linux or CentOS, run yum update prior to installing the Chef server. This will ensure those platforms are fully compatible with this requirement.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器需要x86_64兼容的系统架构。当在Red Hat Enterprise Linux或CentOS 上安装Chef服务器时，请在安装Chef服务器之前运行 yum update 。这将确保这些平台完全符合此要求。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server requires that the systems on which it is running be connected to Network Time Protocol (NTP), as the Chef server is particularly sensitive to clock drift. For Red Hat and CentOS 6:
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器要求其运行的系统必须连接到网络时间协议(NTP),因为Chef服务器对时钟漂移特别敏感。对于Red Hat和CentOS 6。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server server requires that every node that is under management by Chef also have an accurate clock that is synchronized very closely with the clock on the Chef server. If the clocks are not synchronized closely, the authentication process may fail when the clocks are out-of-sync by more than 15 minutes. A failure will trigger a 401 Unauthorized response similar to:
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器服务器要求由Chef管理的每个节点还必须有一个准确的时钟，该时钟必须与Chef服务器上的时钟非常紧密地同步。如果时钟未紧密同步，则时钟不同步超过15分钟时，身份验证过程可能会失败。失败将触发 401 Unauthorized 响应，类似于：

trans-unit.source: The Chef server server uses email to send notifications for various events:
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器服务器使用电子邮件来发送各种事件的通知。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server supports Active Directory and LDAP authentication, which enables users to log in to the Chef server using their corporate credentials.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器支持Active Directory和LDAP认证,这使得用户可以使用他们的企业凭证登录到Chef服务器。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server supports using Active Directory or LDAP for any user that has an email address in the LDAP directory. This allows those users to log in to the Chef server by using their corporate credentials instead of having a separate username and password.
trans-unit.target: 厨师服务器支持对任何在LDAP目录中拥有电子邮件地址的用户使用活动目录或LDAP。这允许这些用户通过使用他们的公司凭证而不是拥有单独的用户名和密码来登录Chef服务器。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server user interface uses the Chef server API to perform most operations. This ensures that authentication requests to the Chef server are authorized. This authentication process is handled automatically and is not something that users of the hosted Chef server will need to manage. For the on-premises Chef server, the authentication keys used by the web interface will need to be maintained by the individual administrators who are responsible for managing the server.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器用户界面使用Chef服务器API来执行大多数操作。这确保了对Chef服务器的认证请求得到授权。這個認證過程是自動處理,不需要託管Chef伺服器的使用者來管理。对于内部的Chef服务器,Web界面使用的认证密钥将需要由负责管理服务器的个别管理员维护。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server uses a role-based access control (RBAC) model to ensure that users may only perform authorized actions.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器使用基于角色的访问控制(RBAC)模型,以确保用户只能执行授权的操作。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server uses organizations, groups, and users to define role-based access control:
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器使用组织、组和用户来定义基于角色的访问控制。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server uses role-based access control (RBAC) to restrict access to objects—nodes, environments, roles, data bags, cookbooks, and so on. This ensures that only authorized user and/or chef-client requests to the Chef server are allowed. Access to objects on the Chef server is fine-grained, allowing access to be defined by object type, object, group, user, and organization. The Chef server uses permissions to define how a user may interact with an object, after they have been authorized to do so.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器使用基于角色的访问控制（RBAC）来限制对对象（节点，环境，角色，数据包，菜谱等）的访问。这确保了仅允许对Chef服务器的授权用户和/或chef-client请求。对Chef服务器上的对象的访问是细粒度的，允许根据对象类型，对象，组，用户和组织来定义访问。在获得授权后，Chef服务器使用权限定义用户与对象进行交互的方式。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server will only try to distribute the cookbooks that are needed to configure an individual node. This is determined by identifying the roles and recipes that are assigned directly to that system, and then to expand the list of dependencies, and then to deliver that entire set to the node. In some cases, if the dependency is not specified in the cookbook’s metadata, the Chef server may not treat that dependency as a requirement, which will result in an error message. If an error message is received from the Chef server about cookbook distribution, verify the depends entries in the metadata.rb file, and then try again.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器将仅尝试分发配置单个节点所需的食谱。这是通过确定直接分配给该系统的角色和配方，然后扩展依赖项列表，然后将整个集合传递给该节点来确定的。在某些情况下，如果未在食谱的元数据中指定依赖项，则Chef服务器可能不会将该依赖项视为要求，这将导致错误消息。如果从Chef服务器收到有关菜谱分发的错误消息，请验证metas.rb文件中的 depends 条目，然后重试。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server will provide signed URLs for cookbook requests made by the various clients (individual users, knife requests, and from the chef-client that is installed on nodes under management by Chef).
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器将为各种客户端(个人用户、小刀请求以及来自安装在由Chef管理的节点上的chef-client)提出的烹饪书请求提供签名的URL。

trans-unit.source: The Chef server will return something similar to:
trans-unit.target: 厨师服务器会返回类似的东西。

trans-unit.source: The Chef web-based management console you can use to manage Role Based Access Control (RBAC), edit and delete nodes, and reset private keys. Keep up to date with what’s happening during Chef Infra Client runs across an entire organization or on specific nodes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用Chef基于Web的管理控制台来管理基于角色的访问控制（RBAC），编辑和删除节点以及重置私钥。及时了解Chef Infra Client在整个组织或特定节点上运行时发生的情况。

trans-unit.source: The Chef website URL. Default value: "https://www.#{node['supermarket']['chef_domain']}".
trans-unit.target: Chef网站的URL。默认值： "https://www.#{node['supermarket']['chef_domain']}" 。

trans-unit.source: The Chef™ Mark and Chef Logo are either registered trademarks/service marks or trademarks/servicemarks of Chef, in the United States and other countries and are used with Chef Inc's permission.
trans-unit.target: Chef™标记和Chef徽标是Chef在美国和其他国家/地区的注册商标/服务标记或Chef /商标/服务标记，并经Che​​f Inc.许可使用。

trans-unit.source: The Chef-managed policies give you a starting point for permissions. You may want to write more fine-grained policies, tailored to the demands of your organization. Defining your own policies must be done from the command line.
trans-unit.target: Chef管理的策略为你提供了一个权限的起点。你可能想根据你的组织的需求,编写更多的细粒度的策略。定义你自己的策略必须在命令行中完成。

trans-unit.source: The Chef-specific commands you execute, but none of the arguments you pass.
trans-unit.target: 您执行的特定于Chef的命令，但不传递任何参数。

trans-unit.source: The ChefSpec repo on github has an impressive collection of examples. For all of the core Chef Infra Client resources, for guards, attributes, multiple actions, and so on. Take a look at those examples and use them as a starting point for building your own unit tests. Some of them are included below, for reference here.
trans-unit.target: github上的ChefSpec回购库包含大量令人印象深刻的示例。对于Chef Infra Client的所有核心资源，包括警卫，属性，多个操作等。看一下这些示例，并将它们用作构建自己的单元测试的起点。其中一些包括在下面，以供参考。

trans-unit.source: The Chocolatey cookbook’s chocolatey_package resource originally contained an :uninstall action. When chocolatey_package was moved into core Chef, we made :uninstall an alias for :remove. In Chef Client 14, :uninstall will no longer be a valid action.
trans-unit.target: Chocolatey食谱的 chocolatey_package 资源最初包含 :uninstall 操作。当Chocolatey_package移入核心Chef时，我们为 :uninstall 了一个别名 :remove 。在Chef Client 14中， :uninstall 将不再是有效的操作。

trans-unit.source: The Chocolatey package manager is not installed on Windows by default. You will need to install it prior to using this resource by adding the Chocolatey cookbook to your node’s run list.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Windows上未安装Chocolatey软件包管理器。您需要在使用此资源之前通过将Chocolatey Cookbook添加到节点的运行列表中进行安装。

trans-unit.source: The Client Runs data lifecycle settings allow you to remove data after a set amount of days. They also allow you to label nodes as missing and automatically remove them after a set amount of days. The default is to remove Chef Infra Client run data after 30 days, to label nodes as missing after 1 day, and to remove nodes labeled as missing after 30 days.
trans-unit.target: 客户端运行数据生命周期设置允许您在设定的天数后删除数据。它们还允许您将节点标记为丢失,并在设定的天数后自动删除它们。默认情况是在30天后删除Chef Infra客户端运行数据,在1天后将节点标记为丢失,在30天后删除标记为丢失的节点。

trans-unit.source: The Client/Active Directory Application you have configured Inspec Azure to use (AZURE_CLIENT_ID) must have permissions to read User data from the Azure Graph RBAC API.
trans-unit.target: 您已配置Inspec Azure以使用的客户端/ Active Directory应用程序（ AZURE_CLIENT_ID ）必须具有从Azure Graph RBAC API读取用户数据的权限。

trans-unit.source: The Cloud KMS key name to use for PD disk encyption for all instances in the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 用于集群中所有实例的 PD 磁盘加密的云 KMS 密钥名称。

trans-unit.source: The Cloud Storage URI of a KMS encrypted file containing the master key of the KDC database.
trans-unit.target: 包含 KDC 数据库主密钥的 KMS 加密文件的云存储 URI。

trans-unit.source: The Cloud Storage URI of a KMS encrypted file containing the password to the user provided key.
trans-unit.target: 包含用户提供的密钥密码的 KMS 加密文件的云存储 URI。

trans-unit.source: The Cloud Storage URI of a KMS encrypted file containing the password to the user provided keystore.
trans-unit.target: 包含用户提供的密钥存储密码的KMS加密文件的云存储URI。

trans-unit.source: The Cloud Storage URI of a KMS encrypted file containing the password to the user provided truststore.
trans-unit.target: KMS加密文件的云存储URI,其中包含用户提供的truststore的密码。

trans-unit.source: The Cloud Storage URI of a KMS encrypted file containing the shared password between the on-cluster Kerberos realm and the remote trusted realm, in a cross realm trust relationship.
trans-unit.target: 在跨领域信任关系中,KMS 加密文件的云存储 URI,其中包含集群上 Kerberos 领域和远程受信任领域之间的共享密码。

trans-unit.source: The Cloud Storage URI of the keystore file used for SSL encryption.
trans-unit.target: 用于SSL加密的keystore文件的云存储URI。

trans-unit.source: The Cloud Storage staging bucket used to stage files, such as Hadoop jars, between client machines and the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 云存储暂存桶用于在客户端机器和集群之间暂存文件(如 Hadoop jars)。

trans-unit.source: The Community Advocate should take the following steps if the behavior is not brought in-line with our guidelines or the incident is not resolved:
trans-unit.target: 如果行为不符合我们的准则或事件没有得到解决,社区倡导者应采取以下步骤。

trans-unit.source: The Compliance data lifecycle settings allow you to remove compliance reports and compliance scans after a set amount of days. The default is to remove compliance reports after 60 days, and to remove compliance scans after 60 days.
trans-unit.target: 合规数据生命周期设置允许您在设定的天数后删除合规性报告和合规性扫描。默认情况是在60天后删除合规性报告,在60天后删除合规性扫描。

trans-unit.source: The Compliance packages in this guide are available to all for demonstration purposes. See our Chef Compliance site for more information about our premium packages.
trans-unit.target: 本指南中的合规性软件包可用于所有人进行演示。有关我们高级套餐的更多信息，请访问我们的厨师合规性网站。

trans-unit.source: The Compliance search allows you to view and filter compliance scan results based on a defined set of filters. Wildcard searches on field values will not return suggestions, but they will filter the results. For example, you can search for Node Name: prod* and filter the results to list all the node names that begin with prod.
trans-unit.target: 通过合规性搜索，您可以基于一组定义的过滤器查看和过滤合规性扫描结果。对字段值进行通配符搜索不会返回建议，但会过滤结果。例如，您可以搜索 Node Name: prod* 并过滤结果以列出所有以 prod 开头的节点名称。

trans-unit.source: The Compliance server must be integrated with Chef Infra Server for use in reporting.
trans-unit.target: 合规性服务器必须与Chef Infra服务器集成,以便在报告中使用。

trans-unit.source: The Cookbooks Site API is used to provide access to the cookbooks community hosted at https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks. All of the cookbooks in the community are accessible through a RESTful API located at https://supermarket.chef.io/api/v1/cookbooks by using any of the supported endpoints. In most cases, using knife is the best way to interact with these cookbooks; in some cases, using the Cookbooks Site API directly is necessary.
trans-unit.target: Cookbooks网站API用于提供对https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks上托管的Cookbooks社区的访问。可以使用任何受支持的端点通过位于https://supermarket.chef.io/api/v1/cookbooks的RESTful API来访问社区中的所有食谱。在大多数情况下，使用刀是与这些食谱进行交互的最佳方法。在某些情况下，必须直接使用Cookbooks网站API。

trans-unit.target: DCO是每位开发人员所做的所有贡献的证明。在贡献的提交消息中，开发人员只需添加一个Signed-by-by语句，从而同意DCO，您可以在下面或在https://developercertificate.org/上找到该DCO 。

trans-unit.source: The Delivery CLI commands are for a user to link their own account to GitHub, or others if the user has the Admin role; api is an argument to the Delivery CLI command. The automate-ctl command can only be run by an administrator from the Chef Automate server and can affect any user.
trans-unit.target: Delivery CLI命令用于用户将其自己的帐户链接到GitHub，如果用户具有Admin角色，则将其他帐户链接到GitHub ； api 是Delivery CLI命令的参数。该 automate-ctl 命令只能由厨师自动化服务器管理员来运行，并且可以影响任何用户。

trans-unit.source: The Delivery CLI from the latest Chef Workstation must be installed on any workstations that setup and initialize GitHub-integrated projects.
trans-unit.target: 最新的Chef Workstation的Delivery CLI必须安装在任何设置和初始化GitHub集成项目的工作站上。

trans-unit.source: The Delivery CLI is included in Chef Workstation and can be obtained by installing the latest version.
trans-unit.target: 交付CLI包含在Chef工作站中，可以通过安装最新版本来获取。

trans-unit.source: The Delivery CLI is the command-line interface for the workflow capabilities in Chef Automate. It sits in-between a local git repository and the Chef Automate server.
trans-unit.target: 交付CLI是Chef Automate中工作流功能的命令行界面,它位于本地git仓库和Chef Automate服务器之间。它位于本地 git 仓库和 Chef Automate 服务器之间。

trans-unit.target: 必需绑定、可选绑定和绑定模式之间的区别。

trans-unit.target: 必须提供ECR repository_name。

trans-unit.source: The ELRepo provides updated drivers for the Linux family of enterprise distributions (based on Red Hat Enterprise Linux.) With the introduction of Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6, Red Hat no longer distributes DRBD within the kernel. These modules provide properly built, community tested releases of the required kernel and DRBD userland.
trans-unit.target: 随着Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6的推出,Red Hat不再在内核中发布DRBD。这些模块提供了所需内核和 DRBD 用户区的正确构建、社区测试的版本。

trans-unit.source: The EN_US (UTF-8) character set should be installed on the logical partition prior to installing the Chef Infra Client
trans-unit.target: 在安装Chef Infra Client之前,应在逻辑分区上安装EN_US (UTF-8)字符集。

trans-unit.source: The EN_US (UTF-8) character set should be installed on the logical partition prior to installing the chef-client
trans-unit.target: 在安装 chef-client 之前,应该在逻辑分区上安装 EN_US (UTF-8)字符集。

trans-unit.source: The Effortless Pattern is a way to better manage Chef Infra and Chef InSpec workloads using Chef Habitat, and to visualize your fleet using Chef Automate. We believe that each of these technologies working together can help you better manage your infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Effortless Pattern是一种使用Chef Habitat更好地管理Chef Infra和Chef InSpec工作负载的方法,并使用Chef Automate将您的车队可视化。我们相信,这些技术中的每一项一起工作都可以帮助您更好地管理您的基础设施。

trans-unit.source: The ElastiCache cluster ID and node ID must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 必须提供ElastiCache集群ID和节点ID。

trans-unit.source: The ElastiCache cluster ID must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 必须提供ElastiCache集群ID。

trans-unit.source: The Elasticsearch JVM’s heap size. Default value:
trans-unit.target: Elasticsearch JVM的堆大小。默认值：

trans-unit.source: The Elasticsearch Java Virtual Machine’s currently allocated amount of heap memory in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Elasticsearch Java虚拟机当前分配的堆内存量（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The Elasticsearch Java Virtual Machine’s currently allocated amount of non-heap memory in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Elasticsearch Java虚拟机当前分配的非堆内存量（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The Elasticsearch heap size can, and in most cases should, be set to 50% of the available system memory. However, you should review and consider the important caveats covered in the Elasticsearch heap size documentation.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，Elasticsearch堆大小可以设置为可用系统内存的50％。但是，您应该查看并考虑Elasticsearch堆大小文档中涵盖的重要警告。

trans-unit.source: The Email address associated with the current Account.
trans-unit.target: 与当前账户相关联的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: The ErrorReport Handler is built into Chef Infra Client and can be used for both exceptions and reports. It serializes error report data to a JSON file. This handler may be enabled in one of the following ways.
trans-unit.target: ErrorReport Handler内置在Chef Infra Client中,可以用于异常和报告。它将错误报告数据序列化到一个JSON文件。该处理程序可以通过以下方式之一启用。

trans-unit.source: The Event Feed Data Lifecycle settings allow you to remove all event feed data and Chef Infra Server actions after a set amount of days. The default is to remove event feed data after 7 days, and Chef Infra Server actions after 30 days.
trans-unit.target: 事件馈送数据生命周期设置允许您在设定的天数后删除所有事件馈送数据和Chef Infra Server操作。默认值是在 7 天后删除事件馈送数据,30 天后删除 Chef Infra Server 动作。

trans-unit.source: The Event Guitar Strings is a timeline representing Chef Infra Server and Compliance events. The events are separated into create, update, and delete. Blue circles show create events, red circles show delete events, and purple diamonds show update events. The icons inside of the shapes represent different types of events, and a multi-event icon denotes a case where multiple events happened within the same 4-hour window. Hovering over the icon shows a text box summarizing the events for that 4-hour window.
trans-unit.target: 事件吉他串是一个代表Chef Infra Server和合规事件的时间线。事件分为创建、更新和删除。蓝色圆圈表示创建事件,红色圆圈表示删除事件,紫色钻石表示更新事件。形状内的图标代表不同类型的事件,多事件图标表示同一4小时窗口内发生多个事件的情况。将鼠标悬停在图标上会显示一个文本框,总结该4小时窗口的事件。

trans-unit.source: The Event Hub-compatible consumer group identifier, e.g. my-consumer-group.
trans-unit.target: 与事件中心兼容的消费者组标识符，例如 my-consumer-group 。

trans-unit.source: The Event Hub-compatible consumer group names identifier.
trans-unit.target: 与Event Hub兼容的消费者群体名称标识符。

trans-unit.source: The Event Log contains entries for every time that the value changed, as well as one for when the input was first created. When possible, stack probing is used to determine file and line numbers. Most importantly, you will see priority numbers; remember that highest priority wins; order only matters to break a tie.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志包含每次改变值的条目,以及第一次创建输入时的条目。在可能的情况下,堆栈探测被用来确定文件和行号。最重要的是,您将看到优先级数字;记住,最高优先级获胜;顺序只对打破平局很重要。

trans-unit.source: The FQDN for the Chef Analytics server should not exceed 64 characters when using OpenSSL. OpenSSL requires the CN in a certificate to be no longer than 64 characters. By default, Chef Analytics uses the FQDN of the server to determine the common name (CN). If the FQDN of the Chef Analytics server is longer than 64 characters, the chef-server-ctl reconfigure command will not fail, but an empty certificate file will be created. Nginx will not start if a certificate file is empty.
trans-unit.target: 使用OpenSSL时，Chef Analytics服务器的FQDN不得超过64个字符。OpenSSL要求证书中的 CN 不能超过64个字符。默认情况下，Chef Analytics使用服务器的FQDN来确定公用名（ CN ）。如果Chef Analytics Server的FQDN超过64个字符， chef-server-ctl reconfigure 命令将不会失败，但是将创建一个空的证书文件。如果证书文件为空，Nginx将不会启动。

trans-unit.source: The FQDN for the Chef Infra Server should be resolvable, lowercase, and have fewer than 64 characters including the domain suffix, when using OpenSSL, as OpenSSL requires the CN in a certificate to be no longer than 64 characters.
trans-unit.target: 当使用OpenSSL时，Chef Infra Server的FQDN应该可解析，小写并且少于64个字符（包括域后缀），因为OpenSSL要求证书中的 CN 不能超过64个字符。

trans-unit.source: The FQDN for the Chef Infra Server should be resolvable, lowercase, and should not exceed 64 characters when using OpenSSL, as OpenSSL requires the CN in a certificate to be no longer than 64 characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用OpenSSL时，Chef Infra Server的FQDN应该是可解析的，小写的，并且不应超过64个字符，因为OpenSSL要求证书中的 CN 不能超过64个字符。

trans-unit.source: The FQDN for the Chef Infra Server. This setting is not in the server configuration file by default. When added, its value should be equal to the FQDN for the service URI used by the Chef Infra Server. For example: api_fqdn "chef.example.com".
trans-unit.target: Chef Infra服务器的FQDN。默认情况下，此设置不在服务器配置文件中。添加后，其值应等于Chef Infra Server使用的服务URI的FQDN。例如： api_fqdn "chef.example.com" 。

trans-unit.target: 使用OpenSSL时，Chef服务器的FQDN不得超过64个字符。OpenSSL要求证书中的 CN 不能超过64个字符。

trans-unit.target: Chef服务器的FQDN。默认情况下，此设置不在服务器配置文件中。添加后，其值应等于Chef服务器使用的服务URI的FQDN。例如： api_fqdn "chef.example.com" 。

trans-unit.source: The FQDN saved in the workflow.toml on the Chef Automate Server must match the FQDN of the Chef Infra Server (find it by entering hostname --fqdn into your Chef Infra Server terminal) or you will have SSL certificate failures later in this process.

trans-unit.source: The Habitat 0.85.0 release in September 2019 improved the handling of custom certificates. Now Habitat knows to look for custom certificates in the ~/.hab/cache/ssl directory, which is /hab/cache/ssl when you are running as root. Copying multiple certificates–for example, a self-signed certificate and a custom certificate authority certificate–to the Chef Habitat cache directory makes them automatically available to the Habitat client.
trans-unit.target: 2019年9月的Habitat 0.85.0版本改进了自定义证书的处理。现在，Habitat知道要在 ~/.hab/cache/ssl 目录中查找自定义证书，当您以root身份运行时，该目录为 /hab/cache/ssl 。将多个证书（例如，自签名证书和自定义证书颁发机构证书）复制到Chef Habitat缓存目录，将使它们自动对人居客户端可用。

trans-unit.source: The IP address range for the cluster pod IPs. If this field is set, then cluster.cluster_ipv4_cidr must be left blank. This field is only applicable when useIpAliases is true. This field is only applicable when useIpAliases is true. If unspecified, the range will use the default size. Set to /netmask (e.g. /14) to have a range chosen with a specific netmask.

trans-unit.source: The IP address range of the instance IPs in this cluster. This is applicable only if createSubnetwork is true. Set to blank to have a range chosen with the default size. Set to /netmask (e.g. /14) to have a range chosen with a specific netmask.

trans-unit.source: The IP address that this forwarding rule is serving on behalf of. Addresses are restricted based on the forwarding rule’s load balancing scheme (EXTERNAL or INTERNAL) and scope (global or regional). When the load balancing scheme is EXTERNAL, for global forwarding rules, the address must be a global IP, and for regional forwarding rules, the address must live in the same region as the forwarding rule. If this field is empty, an ephemeral IPv4 address from the same scope (global or regional) will be assigned. A regional forwarding rule supports IPv4 only. A global forwarding rule supports either IPv4 or IPv6. When the load balancing scheme is INTERNAL, this can only be an RFC 1918 IP address belonging to the network/subnet configured for the forwarding rule. By default, if this field is empty, an ephemeral internal IP address will be automatically allocated from the IP range of the subnet or network configured for this forwarding rule. An address can be specified either by a literal IP address or a URL reference to an existing Address resource. The following examples are all valid:
trans-unit.target: 该转发规则所代表的IP地址。根据转发规则的负载平衡方案（EXTERNAL或INTERNAL）和范围（全局或区域）限制地址。当负载平衡方案为EXTERNAL时，对于全局转发规则，该地址必须是全局IP，对于区域转发规则，该地址必须与该转发规则位于同一区域。如果此字段为空，则将分配来自同一作用域（全局或区域）的临时IPv4地址。区域转发规则仅支持IPv4。全局转发规则支持IPv4或IPv6。当负载平衡方案为INTERNAL时，这只能是属于为转发规则配置的网络/子网的RFC 1918 IP地址。默认情况下，如果此字段为空，临时内部IP地址将从为此转发规则配置的子网或网络的IP范围中自动分配。可以通过文字IP地址或对现有Address资源的URL引用来指定地址。以下示例均有效：

trans-unit.source: The IP address that this forwarding rule is serving on behalf of. Addresses are restricted based on the forwarding rule’s load balancing scheme (external or internal) and scope (global or regional). The address must be a global IP for external global forwarding rules. If this field is empty, an ephemeral IPv4 address from the same scope (global) is chosen. Global forwarding rules supports either IPv4 or IPv6. When the load balancing scheme is INTERNAL_SELF_MANAGED, this must be a URL reference to an existing Address resource (internal regional static IP address), with a purpose of GCE_END_POINT and addressType of INTERNAL. An address can be specified either by a literal IP address or a URL reference to an existing Address resource. The following examples are all valid:
trans-unit.target: 该转发规则所代表的IP地址。根据转发规则的负载平衡方案（外部或内部）和范围（全局或区域）来限制地址。该地址必须是用于外部全局转发规则的全局IP。如果此字段为空，则选择来自同一作用域（全局）的临时IPv4地址。全局转发规则支持IPv4或IPv6。当负载平衡方案是INTERNAL_SELF_MANAGED时，它必须是对现有地址资源（内部区域静态IP地址）的URL引用，目的是GCE_END_POINT和addressType为INTERNAL。可以通过文字IP地址或对现有Address资源的URL引用来指定地址。以下示例均有效：

trans-unit.source: The IP address to use when configuring the hosts file.
trans-unit.target: 配置hosts文件时要使用的IP地址。

trans-unit.source: The IP address used by ZeroMQ. Default value: tcp://*.
trans-unit.target: ZeroMQ使用的IP地址。预设值： tcp://* 。

trans-unit.source: The IP protocol to which this rule applies. The protocol type is required when creating a firewall rule. This value can either be one of the following well known protocol strings (tcp, udp, icmp, esp, ah, sctp, ipip), or the IP protocol number.
trans-unit.target: 该规则适用的IP协议。创建防火墙规则时需要协议类型。这个值可以是以下众所周知的协议字符串之一(tcp、udp、icmp、esp、ah、sctp、ipip),也可以是IP协议号。

trans-unit.source: The IP protocol to which this rule applies. When the load balancing scheme is INTERNAL, only TCP and UDP are valid.
trans-unit.target: 本规则所适用的IP协议。当负载均衡方案为INTERNAL时,只有TCP和UDP有效。

trans-unit.source: The IP protocol to which this rule applies. When the load balancing scheme is INTERNAL_SELF_MANAGED, only TCP is valid.
trans-unit.target: 本规则所适用的IP协议。当负载均衡方案为INTERNAL_SELF_MANAGED时,只有TCP有效。

trans-unit.source: The IP range in CIDR notation to use for the hosted master network. This range will be used for assigning internal IP addresses to the master or set of masters, as well as the ILB VIP. This range must not overlap with any other ranges in use within the cluster’s network.

trans-unit.source: The IP range to advertise. The value must be a CIDR-formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 要发布广告的 IP 范围。该值必须是CIDR格式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The IPv4 address range that is managed by the VPC.
