trans-unit.source: The IPv6 address assigned to the instance. This property is applicable only to First Generation instances.

trans-unit.source: The Identity Provider’s Id, which is a URL that uniquely identifies your SAML identity provider. This is found as an attribute entityId under the EntityDescriptor element. Copy this value and put it in the Identity Provider URL text box. SAML assertions sent to Chef Automate must match this value exactly in the <saml:Issuer> attribute of SAML assertions.
trans-unit.target: 身份提供者的ID，即唯一标识您的SAML身份提供者的URL。可以在EntityDescriptor元素下找到该属性作为attributeEntityId。复制此值并将其放在“身份提供者URL”文本框中。发送到Chef Automate的SAML断言必须与SAML断言的<saml：Issuer>属性中的该值完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: The Identity Provider’s SSO Login location. This can be retrieved from the metadata file. Look for the SingleSignOnService element and the Binding and Location attributes in that element. Ensure that the binding is a HTTP-Redirect binding. This is currently the only SSO Login Binding type supported in Chef Automate. Copy this location and put it in the Single Sign-On Login URL text box.
trans-unit.target: 身份提供者的SSO登录位置。可以从元数据文件中检索出来。查找SingleSignOnService元素以及该元素中的Binding和Location属性。确保绑定是HTTP重定向绑定。当前，这是Chef Automate中支持的唯一SSO登录绑定类型。复制此位置并将其放在“单一登录登录URL”文本框中。

trans-unit.source: The JsonFile handler is available from the chef_handler cookbook and can be used with exceptions and reports. It serializes run status data to a JSON file. This handler may be enabled in one of the following ways.

trans-unit.source: The Keepalived service manages the VRRP and cluster transitions. It should be running on both the primary and secondary servers. To transition from the primary to the secondary, simply run the following command on the primary Chef server:

trans-unit.source: The Launcher enables the Supervisor to update itself without shutting down or re-parenting the services that the Supervisor is supervising. The Launcher is versioned separately from the Supervisor and should be updated very infrequently since an update of the Launcher could require a system restart if it is running as process 1.
trans-unit.target: Launcher使Supervisor能够在不关闭或重新代理Supervisor所监督的服务的情况下进行自我更新。Launcher的版本与Supervisor的版本是分开的,应该很少更新,因为如果Launcher作为进程1运行,则Launcher的更新可能需要重新启动系统。

trans-unit.source: The Launcher is designed to run as process 1; it is minimal by design. Its responsibilities are simply to be the parent process for the Supervisor.
trans-unit.target: 启动器被设计为作为进程1运行;它的设计是最小的。它的职责只是作为主管的父进程。

trans-unit.source: The Name Id Policy is important because it identifies the user that the SAML assertion applies to. In order for Chef Automate to authenticate the user, the Name Id that the IdP returns must exactly match a Chef Automate SAML user name. In addition, it must match the user name that was entered at the Chef Automate login page. Therefore, the the IdP or the SP must be configured with an appropriate Name Id Policy. In some cases, you (or your system administrator) may need to either negotiate or configure the Name Id Policy on the IdP itself. Name Id mismatches will lead to successful logins (as far as the IdP is concerned), but not leading to the Chef Automate login of the expected user. Instead, a new user will be provisioned with the username matching the returned NameId.
trans-unit.target: Name Id 策略很重要,因为它标识了 SAML 断言所适用的用户。为了让Chef Automate验证用户,IdP返回的Name Id必须与Chef Automate的SAML用户名完全匹配。此外,它必须与在Chef Automate登录页面输入的用户名相匹配。因此,IdP 或 SP 必须配置适当的 Name Id 策略。在某些情況下,您 (或您的系統管理員)可能需要協商或在 IdP 本身配置名稱 Id 政策。名字Id不匹配将导致成功登录(就IdP而言),但不会导致预期用户的Chef自动登录。取而代之的是,一个新用户将被配置为与返回的 NameId 相匹配的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The ORGANIZATION-validator.pem and USER.pem files must be moved to the .chef directory after they are downloaded from the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: ORGANIZATION-validator.pem 和 USER.pem 文件从 Chef 服务器下载后,必须移动到 .chef 目录。

trans-unit.source: The ORGANIZATION-validator.pem is typically added to the .chef directory on the workstation. When a node is bootstrapped from that workstation, the ORGANIZATION-validator.pem is used to authenticate the newly-created node to the Chef Infra Server during the initial Chef Infra Client run. It is possible to bootstrap a node using the USER.pem file instead of the ORGANIZATION-validator.pem file. This is known as a “validatorless bootstrap”.
trans-unit.target: 通常将ORGANIZATION-validator.pem添加到工作站上的.chef目录中。从该工作站引导节点后，在初始Chef Infra Client运行期间，将使用ORGANIZATION-validator.pem向Chef Infra Server认证新创建的节点。可以使用USER.pem文件而不是ORGANIZATION-validator.pem文件来引导节点。这称为“无验证程序的引导程序”。

trans-unit.source: The ORGANIZATION-validator.pem is typically added to the .chef directory on the workstation. When a node is bootstrapped from that workstation, the ORGANIZATION-validator.pem is used to authenticate the newly-created node to the Chef server during the initial chef-client run. Starting with chef-client version 12.1, it is possible to bootstrap a node using the USER.pem file instead of the ORGANIZATION-validator.pem file. This is known as a “validatorless bootstrap”.
trans-unit.target: 通常将ORGANIZATION-validator.pem添加到工作站上的.chef目录。从该工作站引导节点后，在初始Chef客户端运行期间，将使用ORGANIZATION-validator.pem将新创建的节点认证到Chef服务器。从Chef-client版本12.1开始，可以使用USER.pem文件而不是ORGANIZATION-validator.pem文件来引导节点。这称为“无验证程序的引导程序”。

trans-unit.source: The Ohai DSL is a Ruby DSL that is used to define an Ohai plugin and to ensure that Ohai collects the right data at the start of every Chef Infra Client run. The Ohai DSL is a small DSL with a single method that is specific to Ohai plugins. Because the Ohai DSL is a Ruby DSL, anything that can be done using Ruby can also be done when defining an Ohai plugin.
trans-unit.target: Ohai DSL是一个Ruby DSL,用于定义Ohai插件,并确保Ohai在每个Chef Infra客户端运行开始时收集正确的数据。Ohai DSL是一个小的DSL,有一个特定于Ohai插件的单一方法。因为Ohai DSL是一个Ruby DSL,所以在定义Ohai插件时,任何可以用Ruby做的事情也可以做。

trans-unit.source: The Ohai executable ignores settings in the client.rb file when Ohai is run independently of Chef Infra Client.

trans-unit.source: The PostgreSQL superuser name in 'username@hostname' format (e.g. 'opscode_pgsql@my_postgresql.postgres.database.azure.com'), where username would normally equal the value of postgresql['db_superuser'] with any dashes replaced by underscores. This setting is required in an external Azure PostgreSQL database-as-a-service configuration. If set to nil, Chef Infra Server assumes that the database is not on Azure and the PostgreSQL connection will be made using the value specified in postgresql['db_superuser']. Default value: nil.

trans-unit.source: The Push Jobs API is used to create jobs and retrieve status using Chef Push Jobs, a tool that pushes jobs against a set of nodes in the organization. All requests are signed using the Chef Infra Server API and the validation key on the workstation from which the requests are made.
trans-unit.target: 推送作业API用于使用Chef Push Jobs创建作业和检索状态,Chef Push Jobs是一种针对组织中的一组节点推送作业的工具。所有请求都使用Chef Infra Server API和发出请求的工作站上的验证密钥进行签名。

trans-unit.source: The Push Jobs API is used to create jobs and retrieve status using Chef Push Jobs, a tool that pushes jobs against a set of nodes in the organization. All requests are signed using the Chef Infra Server API and the validation key on the workstation from which the requests are made. All commands are sent to the Chef Infra Server using the knife exec subcommand.
trans-unit.target: Push Jobs API用于使用Chef Push Jobs创建作业和检索状态，Chef Push Jobs是一种将作业推向组织中的一组节点的工具。所有请求均使用Chef Infra Server API和在发出请求的工作站上的验证密钥进行签名。所有所有命令都使用 knife exec 子命令发送到Chef Infra服务器。

trans-unit.source: The RAM requirement can be lowered down to a minimum of 4 GB of RAM if the number of Chef Infra Client runs (CCRs) per minute are low (i.e. less than 33 CCRs/min). See Capacity Planning for more information on how this metric affects scalability.

trans-unit.source: The Recipe DSL is a Ruby DSL that is primarily used to declare resources from within a recipe. The Recipe DSL also helps ensure that recipes interact with nodes (and node properties) in the desired manner. Most of the methods in the Recipe DSL are used to find a specific parameter and then tell Chef Infra Client what action(s) to take, based on whether that parameter is present on a node.
trans-unit.target: Recipe DSL是一个Ruby DSL,主要用于从配方中声明资源。Recipe DSL也有助于确保配方与节点(和节点属性)以所需的方式进行交互。Recipe DSL中的大部分方法都是用来寻找一个特定的参数,然后根据节点上是否存在该参数,告诉Chef Infra Client要采取什么行动。

trans-unit.source: The Recipe DSL is a Ruby DSL that is primarily used to declare resources from within a recipe. The Recipe DSL also helps ensure that recipes interact with nodes (and node properties) in the desired manner. Most of the methods in the Recipe DSL are used to find a specific parameter and then tell the chef-client what action(s) to take, based on whether that parameter is present on a node.
trans-unit.target: Recipe DSL是一个Ruby DSL,主要用于从配方中声明资源。Recipe DSL还有助于确保配方与节点(和节点属性)以所需的方式进行交互。Recipe DSL中的大多数方法都是用来寻找一个特定的参数,然后根据该参数是否存在于节点上,告诉厨师客户端要采取什么行动。

trans-unit.source: The SSH-based Job Dispatch system used with runners is not a replacement for Push Jobs. Job Dispatch is a targeted solution for managing phase builds and Push Jobs allows users to perform remote tasks on pools of nodes. Job Dispatch uses SSH connections and allows additional features, such as cancelling jobs.

trans-unit.source: The SSL protocol versions that are enabled. SSL 3.0 is supported by the Chef Infra Server; however, SSL 3.0 is an obsolete and insecure protocol. Transport Layer Security (TLS)—TLS 1.0, TLS 1.1, and TLS 1.2—has effectively replaced SSL 3.0, which provides for authenticated version negotiation between Chef Infra Client and Chef Infra Server, which ensures the latest version of the TLS protocol is used. For the highest possible security, it is recommended to disable SSL 3.0 and allow all versions of the TLS protocol. For example:

trans-unit.source: The Supermarket API has the following endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 超市API有以下端点。

trans-unit.source: The Supermarket API is used to provide access to cookbooks, tools, and users on the Chef Supermarket. All of the cookbooks, tools, and users on the Supermarket are accessible through a RESTful API by accessing supermarket.chef.io/api/v1/ via the supported endpoints. In most cases, knife is the best way to interact with the Supermarket; however in some cases, direct use of the Supermarket API is necessary.
trans-unit.target: 超级市场API用于提供对Chef Supermarket上的菜谱，工具和用户的访问。超级市场上的所有菜谱，工具和用户都可以通过RESTful API访问，方法是通过支持的端点访问 supermarket.chef.io/api/v1/ .chef.io / api / v1 /。在大多数情况下，刀是与超市互动的最佳方式。但是，在某些情况下，必须直接使用Supermarket API。

trans-unit.source: The Supermarket API is used to provide access to cookbooks, tools, and users on the Chef Supermarket. All of the cookbooks, tools, and users on the Supermarket are accessible through a RESTful API by accessing supermarket.chef.io/api/v1/ via the supported endpoints. In most cases, knife is the best way to interact with the Supermarket; however in some cases, direct use of the Supermarket API is necessary. .. note:: In general, using knife (and the knife supermarket subcommand) to manage cookbooks that are located on the Cookbooks site is more efficient than using the Supermarket API and is the recommended approach for managing cookbooks on that site. This document provides information about the Supermarket API in the event that using the API is necessary.
trans-unit.target: 超级市场API用于提供对Chef Supermarket上的菜谱，工具和用户的访问。超级市场上的所有食谱，工具和用户都可以通过RESTful API通过受支持的端点访问 supermarket.chef.io/api/v1/ .chef.io / api / v1 /来访问。在大多数情况下，刀是与超市互动的最佳方式。但是，在某些情况下，必须直接使用Supermarket API。 ..注意：：通常，使用刀（和 knife supermarket 子命令）来管理Cookbooks网站上的菜谱比使用Supermarket API更为有效，这是在该站点上管理菜谱的推荐方法。如果需要使用该API，本文档将提供有关Supermarket API的信息。

trans-unit.source: The Supervisor Ring
trans-unit.target: 监理环

trans-unit.source: The Supervisor becomes part of the named ring <RING> and uses the key for network encryption. Other supervisors that now attempt to connect to it without presenting the correct ring key will be rejected.
trans-unit.target: Supervisor成为命名环 <RING> 的一部分，并使用该密钥进行网络加密。现在尝试在未提供正确的铃声的情况下连接到它的其他管理员将被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: The Supervisor control gateway is used to issue commands to a remote Supervisor. When a new Supervisor is created, a key for the HAB_CTL_SECRET environment variable is generated for it by default, if one is not already present; this key is used to authenticate requests that are made via the control gateway. See the control gateway documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: Supervisor控制网关用于向远程Supervisor发出命令。创建新的Supervisor时，默认情况下会为其生成 HAB_CTL_SECRET 环境变量的密钥（如果尚未存在）。该密钥用于验证通过控制网关发出的请求。有关更多详细信息，请参见控制网关文档。

trans-unit.source: The Supervisor currently supports simple HTTP authentication using Bearer tokens. By default, no authentication is used. If you would like to require authentication, export the HAB_SUP_GATEWAY_AUTH_TOKEN environment variable before starting the Supervisor. All HTTP requests will then require that same token to be present in an Authorization header, or they will receive a 401 Unauthorized response.
trans-unit.target: Supervisor当前支持使用Bearer令牌的简单HTTP身份验证。默认情况下，不使用身份验证。如果您需要身份验证，请在启动Supervisor之前导出 HAB_SUP_GATEWAY_AUTH_TOKEN 环境变量。然后，所有HTTP请求都将要求相同的令牌出现在Authorization标头中，否则它们将收到401 Unauthorized响应。

trans-unit.source: The Supervisor dynamically invokes hooks at run-time, triggered by an application lifecycle event. You can read more about hooks here.
trans-unit.target: Supervisor在运行时由应用程序生命周期事件触发动态调用挂钩。您可以在这里阅读更多有关钩子的信息。

trans-unit.source: The Supervisor is a process manager that has two primary responsibilities. First, it starts and monitors child services defined in the plan it is running. Second, it receives and acts upon information from the other Supervisors to which it is connected. A service will be reconfigured through application lifecycle hooks if its configuration has changed.
trans-unit.target: 监督员是一个过程管理者,有两个主要职责。首先,它启动并监督它所执行的计划中规定的儿童服务。其次,它从与其相连的其他 Supervisors 接收信息并采取行动。如果服务的配置发生了变化,它将通过应用程序生命周期钩子进行重新配置。

trans-unit.source: The Supervisor settings look-up order:
trans-unit.target: 监理人设置查询顺序。

trans-unit.source: The Supervisor will now take its configuration and hooks from /src, rather than from the package you previously built. When the configuration is as you want it, do a final rebuild of the package.
trans-unit.target: Supervisor现在将从/src中获取配置和钩子,而不是从你之前构建的软件包中获取。当配置符合你的要求时,对软件包进行最后的重建。

trans-unit.source: The Upgrade Lab assumes but does not require that you have a continuous integration pipeline (CI) setup for your cookbooks with:
trans-unit.target: 升级实验室假设但并不要求你有一个持续集成管道(CI)的设置,你的烹饪书与。

trans-unit.source: The Upgrade Lab provides a report of your existing nodes and cookbooks, so you will know the scope of the work and you can identify a good place to start. Upgrade Lab works by capturing any node from the production environment and recreating it locally by generating a repository for that node, which provides you with a sandbox to work through upgrading and testing your cookbooks at a safe distance from your production environment.
trans-unit.target: 升级实验室提供了您现有节点和cookbook的报告,因此您将知道工作的范围,您可以确定一个好的开始。升级实验室的工作方式是从生产环境中捕获任何节点,并通过为该节点生成一个存储库在本地重新创建,这为您提供了一个沙箱,以便在与生产环境保持安全距离的情况下通过升级和测试您的cookbook进行工作。

trans-unit.source: The Upgrade Lab works if you have cookbooks in different locations, but it involves more prompting from the command line.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的食谱在不同的位置,升级实验室可以工作,但它涉及更多的命令行的提示。

trans-unit.source: The Verify stage runs automatically when someone submits a new change or updates an existing change that hasn’t yet been approved. It is made up of the following phases. (Remember that you can skip phases that do not apply to your project and you have complete control over what happens in a given phase job.)

trans-unit.source: The Windows Ohai plugin has been updated to correctly return CPU information. Previously the CPU plugin reported a model_name value, which was actually the CPU’s description and not the actual model name. Ohai now reports the proper name value for model_name and provides description with the previous description value. This behavior aligns CPU plugin behavior between *nix and Windows hosts in Chef.
trans-unit.target: Windows Ohai插件已更新，可以正确返回CPU信息。以前，CPU插件报告了一个 model_name 值，该值实际上是CPU的描述，而不是实际的型号名称。Ohai现在报告的正确名称值 model_name ，并提供 description 与先前描述的值。此行为使* nix和Chef中的Windows主机之间的CPU插件行为保持一致。

trans-unit.source: The Windows and Linux packages in this demonstration work with the Chef Compliance Audit and Remediation content. Find out more about our Chef Compliance offerings.
trans-unit.target: 本演示中的Windows和Linux软件包可与Chef法规遵从性审核和补救内容一起使用。详细了解我们的“厨师合规”产品。

trans-unit.source: The absolute minimum configuration necessary for a node to communicate with the Infra Server is the URL of the Infra Server. All other configuration options either have values at the server side (Policyfiles, Roles, Environments, etc) or have default values determined at client startup.
trans-unit.target: 节点与Infra服务器通信所需的绝对最低配置是Infra服务器的URL,其他的配置选项要么在服务器端取值(Policyfiles、Roles、Environments等),要么在客户端启动时取默认值。所有其他配置选项要么在服务器端有值(Policyfiles、Roles、Environments等),要么在客户端启动时确定默认值。

trans-unit.source: The absolute number of time series that must fail the predicate for the condition to be triggered.
trans-unit.target: 触发条件的前提条件必须失败的时间序列的绝对数量。

trans-unit.source: The access key identifier. (This is configurable and may be pointed at external storage locations, such as Amazon EC2. Four settings require configuration when pointing at an external cookbook storage location: bookshelf['vip'], for the endpoint used by the chef-client; bookshelf['external_url'], for the endpoint used by the Chef server; bookshelf['access_key_id'], for user access key; bookshelf['secret_access_key'], for secret key; and opscode_erchef['s3_bucket'], for the bucket name. Reconfigure the Chef server after changing these settings. Default value: generated by default.
trans-unit.target: 访问密钥标识符。 （这是可配置的，可以指向外部存储位置，例如Amazon EC2。指向外部食谱存储位置时，需要进行四个设置配置： bookshelf['vip'] ，用于厨师客户端使用的终端； bookshelf['external_url'] （用于Chef服务器使用的端点）； bookshelf['access_key_id'] （用于用户访问密钥）； bookshelf['secret_access_key'] （用于密钥）；以及 opscode_erchef['s3_bucket'] （用于存储桶名称）。更改这些设置后，重新配置Chef服务器默认值：默认生成。

trans-unit.source: The alignment period for per-time series alignment. If present, alignmentPeriod must be at least 60 seconds. After per-time series alignment, each time series will contain data points only on the period boundaries. If perSeriesAligner is not specified or equals ALIGN_NONE, then this field is ignored. If perSeriesAligner is specified and does not equal ALIGN_NONE, then this field must be defined; otherwise an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 每一时间序列对齐的对齐周期,如果存在,对齐周期必须至少为60秒。如果存在,则 alignmentPeriod 必须至少为 60 秒。每时间序列对齐后,每个时间序列将只包含周期边界上的数据点。如果没有指定perSeriesAligner或者等于ALIGN_NONE,那么这个字段将被忽略。如果指定了perSeriesAligner,并且不等于ALIGN_NONE,那么必须定义这个字段;否则将返回一个错误。

trans-unit.source: The allow_port_from_internet property contains a boolean value determined by analysing the Security Rules and Default Security Rules for unrestricted access to a specified port.
trans-unit.target: allow_port_from_internet 属性包含一个布尔值,通过分析安全规则和默认安全规则来确定对指定端口的无限制访问。

trans-unit.source: The allow_rdp_from_internet property contains a boolean value determined by analysing the Security Rules and Default Security Rules for unrestricted RDP access.
trans-unit.target: allow_rdp_from_internet 属性包含一个由分析安全规则和默认安全规则确定的布尔值,用于无限制的 RDP 访问。

trans-unit.source: The allow_ssh_from_internet property contains a boolean value determined by analysing the Security Rules and Default Security Rules for unrestricted SSH access.
trans-unit.target: allow_ssh_from_internet 属性包含一个由分析安全规则和默认安全规则确定的布尔值,用于无限制的 SSH 访问。

trans-unit.source: The amount of idle time in minutes before the screensaver comes on.
trans-unit.target: 屏保开启前的闲置时间,以分钟为单位。

trans-unit.source: The amount of memory (in MBs) available to Apache Solr. If there is not enough memory available, search queries made by nodes to Apache Solr may fail. The amount of memory that must be available also depends on the number of nodes in the organization, the frequency of search queries, and other characteristics that are unique to each organization. In general, as the number of nodes increases, so does the amount of memory.
trans-unit.target: Apache Solr可用的内存量(MBs)。如果没有足够的可用内存,节点向Apache Solr进行的搜索查询可能会失败。必须可用的内存量还取决于组织中的节点数量、搜索查询的频率以及每个组织特有的其他特性。一般来说,随着节点数量的增加,内存量也会增加。

trans-unit.source: The amount of memory (in MBs) available to Apache Solr. If there is not enough memory available, search queries made by nodes to Apache Solr may fail. The amount of memory that must be available also depends on the number of nodes in the organization, the frequency of search queries, and other characteristics that are unique to each organization. In general, as the number of nodes increases, so does the amount of memory. The default value should work for many organizations with fewer than 25 nodes. For an organization with several hundred nodes, the amount of memory that is required often exceeds 3GB. Default value: nil, which is equivalent to 25% of the system memory or 1024 (MB, but this setting is specified as an integer number of MB in EC11), whichever is smaller.
trans-unit.target: Apache Solr可用的内存量（以MB为单位）。如果没有足够的可用内存，则节点对Apache Solr进行的搜索查询可能会失败。必须可用的内存量还取决于组织中的节点数，搜索查询的频率以及每个组织唯一的其他特征。通常，随着节点数量的增加，内存量也会增加。对于少于25个节点的许多组织，默认值应适用。对于具有数百个节点的组织，所需的内存量通常超过3GB。默认值： nil ，相当于系统内存的25％或1024（MB，但是此设置在EC11中指定为MB的整数），以较小者为准。

trans-unit.source: The amount of memory (in MBs) available to Elasticsearch. If there is not enough memory available, search queries made by nodes to Elasticsearch may fail. The amount of memory that must be available also depends on the number of nodes in the organization, the frequency of search queries, and other characteristics that are unique to each organization. In general, as the number of nodes increases, so does the amount of memory. The default value should work for many organizations with fewer than 25 nodes. For an organization with several hundred nodes, the amount of memory that is required often exceeds 3GB. Default value is is equivalent to 25% of the system memory or 1024 MB, whichever is greater.
trans-unit.target: Elasticsearch的可用内存量(MBs)。如果没有足够的可用内存,节点向Elasticsearch进行的搜索查询可能会失败。必须可用的内存量还取决于组织中的节点数量、搜索查询的频率以及每个组织特有的其他特性。一般来说,随着节点数的增加,内存量也会增加。默认值对于许多节点数少于25个的组织来说应该是可行的。对于拥有几百个节点的组织,所需的内存量往往超过3GB。默认值相当于系统内存的 25% 或 1024 MB,以较大者为准。

trans-unit.source: The amount of memory allocated to the logstash heap. Default value: 10% of system memory or 128 megabytes, whichever is larger. Requires Automate 0.8.46 or above.
trans-unit.target: 分配给logstash堆的内存量,默认值:系统内存的10%或128兆字节,以较大者为准。默认值:系统内存的 10% 或 128 兆字节,以较大者为准。需要 Automate 0.8.46 或以上版本。

trans-unit.source: The amount of memory in MB available for a function.

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in milliseconds) to wait before timing out. Default value: 2000.
trans-unit.target: 超时之前要等待的时间（以毫秒为单位）。预设值： 2000 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in milliseconds) to wait for a connection to be established. Default value: '[{connect_timeout, 5000}]'.
trans-unit.target: 等待建立连接的时间（以毫秒为单位）。默认值： '[{connect_timeout, 5000}]' 。

trans-unit.target: 等待解决食谱依赖关系问题的时间（以毫秒为单位）。默认值： '5000' 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in minutes) after which a user will be logged out, regardless of activity. When not set (or set to 0), a browser session will not have a timed expiration unless a session is inactive longer than the session time limit (see session_timeout). Default value: 10080 (one week).
trans-unit.target: 无论活动如何，用户注销之后的时间（以分钟为单位）。如果未设置（或设置为0），则浏览器会话将不具有超时期限，除非会话处于非活动状态的时间长于会话时间限制（请参阅 session_timeout ）。默认值： 10080 （一周）。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in minutes) between checkpoints. Default value: "5min".
trans-unit.target: 检查点之间的时间（以分钟为单位）。默认值： "5min" 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in minutes) between checkpoints. Default value: '5min'.
trans-unit.target: 检查点之间的时间（以分钟为单位）。默认值： '5min' 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in minutes) between checkpoints. Default value: 5min.
trans-unit.target: 检查点之间的时间（以分钟为单位）。默认值： 5min 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in minutes) for the maximum length of a WinRM session.
trans-unit.target: WinRM会话的最大时间长度(分钟)。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in minutes) of inactivity before a user is logged out. When not set (or set to 0), a browser session will not have a timed expiration and will expire when the browser session ends, quits, or when the computer restarts, or when the absolute session time limit is hit (see session_timeout_absolute). Default value: 1440 (one day).
trans-unit.target: 用户注销之前不活动的时间（以分钟为单位）。如果未设置（或设置为0），则浏览器会话将没有超时时间，并且将在浏览器会话结束，退出，计算机重新启动或达到绝对会话时间限制时终止（请参见 session_timeout_absolute ）。默认值： 1440 （一天）。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in minutes) to delay a reboot request.
trans-unit.target: 延迟重启请求的时间(分钟)。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in minutes) to wait for authentication to succeed. Default value: 25.
trans-unit.target: 等待认证成功的时间（以分钟为单位）。预设值： 25 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in seconds) a client may be idle before timeout. Default value: '300'.
trans-unit.target: 客户端在超时之前可能空闲的时间（以秒为单位）。默认值： '300' 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in seconds) a command is to wait before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 命令在超时之前要等待的时间(以秒为单位)。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in seconds) a command is to wait before timing out. Default value: 3600.
trans-unit.target: 命令超时之前要等待的时间（以秒为单位）。默认值： 3600 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in seconds) a connection must remain idle before keepalive probes will resume. Default value: 60.
trans-unit.target: 连接必须保持空闲状态的时间（以秒为单位），然后才能继续执行keepalive探测。默认值： 60 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in seconds) a job may be idle before it times out. If no value is specified, the default timeout value for launchd will be used.
trans-unit.target: 作业在超时之前可能闲置的时间(以秒为单位)。如果没有指定值,将使用 launchd 的默认超时值。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in seconds) after which a Yum lock request is to time out. Default value: 30.
trans-unit.target: 百胜锁定请求超时之前的时间（以秒为单位）。预设值： 30 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time (in seconds) before a request to the oc_bifrost service times out. Default value: 2000.
trans-unit.target: 对oc_bifrost服务的请求超时之前的时间（以秒为单位）。预设值： 2000 。

trans-unit.source: The amount of time that a time series must violate the threshold to be considered failing. Currently, only values that are a multiple of a minute–e.g., 0, 60, 120, or 300 seconds–are supported. If an invalid value is given, an error will be returned. When choosing a duration, it is useful to keep in mind the frequency of the underlying time series data (which may also be affected by any alignments specified in the aggregations field); a good duration is long enough so that a single outlier does not generate spurious alerts, but short enough that unhealthy states are detected and alerted on quickly.
trans-unit.target: 时间序列必须超过阈值才能被视为失败的时间量。当前，仅支持一分钟的倍数，例如0、60、120或300秒。如果给出一个无效的值，将返回一个错误。选择持续时间时，请记住基础时间序列数据的频率（这也可能会受到“聚合”字段中指定的任何对齐方式的影响），这很有用；良好的持续时间足够长，因此单个异常值不会生成虚假警报，但足够短的时间可以检测到不健康状态并迅速发出警报。

trans-unit.source: The approach that DRBD takes to split-brain event situations is to degrade all partners still alive to secondary status, and then wait for manual intervention. This is called auto-fencing, with a goal of minimizing the potential for damage to your data. When you lose one of the partners in a high availability topology, a bit of manual intervention is required to ensure that the disks aren’t in a bad state and can be brought back up. These scenarios are discussed below, including suggestions for diagnosing and recovering from each scenario.
trans-unit.target: DRBD处理 split-brain 事件的方法是将仍然活着的所有伙伴降级为次要状态，然后等待手动干预。这被称为自动防护，其目标是最大程度地减少损坏数据的可能性。如果您在高可用性拓扑中失去了一个合作伙伴，则需要进行一些手动干预，以确保磁盘不会处于不良状态并可以备份。下面讨论了这些方案，包括有关每种方案的诊断和恢复的建议。

trans-unit.source: The approach to be used to align individual time series. Not all alignment functions may be applied to all time series, depending on the metric type and value type of the original time series. Alignment may change the metric type or the value type of the time series.Time series data must be aligned in order to perform cross- time series reduction. If crossSeriesReducer is specified, then perSeriesAligner must be specified and not equal ALIGN_NONE and alignmentPeriod must be specified; otherwise, an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 用于调整单个时间序列的方法。根据原始时间序列的度量类型和价值类型,并非所有的对齐功能都能适用于所有时间序列。对齐可能会改变时间序列的度量类型或价值类型.时间序列数据必须对齐才能执行交叉时间序列还原。如果指定了crossSeriesReducer,则必须指定perSeriesAligner,且不等于ALIGN_NONE,必须指定alignmentPeriod,否则将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: The approach to be used to combine time series. Not all reducer functions may be applied to all time series, depending on the metric type and the value type of the original time series. Reduction may change the metric type of value type of the time series.Time series data must be aligned in order to perform cross- time series reduction. If crossSeriesReducer is specified, then perSeriesAligner must be specified and not equal ALIGN_NONE and alignmentPeriod must be specified; otherwise, an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 用于组合时间序列的方法。并非所有的还原函数都可以应用于所有的时间序列,这取决于原始时间序列的度量类型和价值类型。还原可能会改变时间序列的度量类型价值类型.时间序列数据必须对齐才能执行交叉时间序列还原。如果指定了crossSeriesReducer,则必须指定perSeriesAligner,且不等于ALIGN_NONE,必须指定alignPeriod,否则将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: The attribute precedence order for roles and environments is reversed for default and override attributes. The precedence order for default attributes is environment, then role. The precedence order for override attributes is role, then environment. Applying environment override attributes after role override attributes allows the same role to be used across multiple environments, yet ensuring that values can be set that are specific to each environment (when required). For example, the role for an application server may exist in all environments, yet one environment may use a database server that is different from other environments.
trans-unit.target: 对于 default 属性和 override 属性，角色和环境的属性优先顺序相反。 default 属性的优先顺序是环境，然后是角色。 override 属性的优先顺序是角色，然后是环境。适用环境 override 属性后角色 override 属性允许在多种环境中使用相同的角色，但保证值可以设置特定于每个环境（需要时）。例如，应用服务器的角色可能存在于所有环境中，但是一个环境可能使用与其他环境不同的数据库服务器。

trans-unit.source: The authenticated endpoint /status provides status for the overall Chef Automate installation as well as for its component services. When all Chef Automate component services are up, /status returns a response code of 200. Otherwise, /status returns 500.
trans-unit.target: 经过身份验证的端点 /status 为Chef Automate的整体安装及其组件服务提供状态。当所有Chef Automate组件服务都启动时， /status 返回一个响应代码200。否则， /status 返回500。

trans-unit.source: The authentication information for accessing the master endpoint.

trans-unit.source: The authentication process ensures the Chef Infra Server responds only to requests made by trusted users. Public key encryption is used by the Chef Infra Server. When a node and/or a workstation is configured to run Chef Infra Client, both public and private keys are created. The public key is stored on the Chef Infra Server, while the private key is returned to the user for safe keeping. (The private key is a .pem file located in the .chef directory or in /etc/chef.)
trans-unit.target: 身份验证过程可确保Chef Infra Server仅响应受信任用户的请求。Chef Infra服务器使用公钥加密。当将节点和/或工作站配置为运行Chef Infra Client时，将创建公钥和私钥。公钥存储在Chef Infra服务器上，而私钥返回给用户以安全保存。（私钥是位于 .chef 目录或 /etc/chef 中的.pem文件。）

trans-unit.source: The authentication process ensures the Chef server responds only to requests made by trusted users. Public key encryption is used by the Chef server. When a node and/or a workstation is configured to run the chef-client, both public and private keys are created. The public key is stored on the Chef server, while the private key is returned to the user for safe keeping. (The private key is a .pem file located in the .chef directory or in /etc/chef.)
trans-unit.target: 身份验证过程可确保Chef服务器仅响应受信任用户的请求。Chef服务器使用公钥加密。当将节点和/或工作站配置为运行Chef客户端时，将创建公钥和私钥。公钥存储在Chef服务器上，而私钥返回给用户以安全保存。（私钥是位于 .chef 目录或 /etc/chef 中的.pem文件。）

trans-unit.source: The auto-build option controls whether or not your package will get automatically re-built. This option is a useful capability to have - for example, if you have a demo app that doesn’t need to be kept constantly up to date when some underlying dependency updates. Auto-build encompasses both builds that are triggered by Github web hooks (on commits to master), as well as builds that are triggered by a dependency updating.
trans-unit.target: 自动构建选项控制您的软件包是否将自动重新构建。此选项具有非常有用的功能-例如，如果您的演示应用程序在某些基础依赖项更新时不需要保持最新状态。自动构建既包括由Github Web钩子触发的构建（在提交到母版时），也包括由依赖项更新触发的构建。

For more information, see storage classes.

trans-unit.target: 当基于日志的度量使用disTRIBUTION值类型时,bucketOptions是必需的,它描述了用于创建提取值直方图的桶边界。

trans-unit.source: The build cookbook, hosted on the Chef Infra Server, determines what happens during each phase job. Runners, under control of the Chef Infra Server, run the phase jobs. It’s a good idea to have at least three runners so that the lint, syntax and unit phases can run in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef Infra Server上托管的构建食谱确定了每个阶段作业期间发生的情况。运行程序在Chef Infra Server的控制下运行阶段作业。至少要有三个运行程序，这样才能使皮棉，语法和单元阶段可以并行运行。

trans-unit.source: The build script ensures that the private origin key is available to sign the artifact.
trans-unit.target: 构建脚本确保私有起源密钥可用于签署工件。

trans-unit.source: The cacert.pem should contain only your root CA’s certificate file. This is not the usual treatment, but mimics how Chef Workstation behaves after a knife ssl fetch followed by a knife ssl verify.
trans-unit.target: cacert.pem应该仅包含您的根CA的证书文件。这不是通常的处理方法，而是模仿Chef工作站在 knife ssl fetch 并随后 knife ssl verify 刀ssl后的行为。

trans-unit.source: The census is the core of the service discovery mechanism in Chef Habitat. It keeps track of every Supervisor in the ring, and handles reading, writing, and serializing it with the discovery backend.
trans-unit.target: census是Chef Habitat中服务发现机制的核心。它跟踪环中的每一个Supervisor,并与发现后台一起处理读、写和序列化。

trans-unit.target: 可以查看证书详细信息并复制其指纹十六进制值

trans-unit.source: The certificate in PEM format. The certificate chain must be no greater than 5 certs long. The chain must include at least one intermediate cert.
trans-unit.target: PEM格式的证书。证书链的长度不得超过5个证书。证书链必须包括至少一个中间证书。

trans-unit.target: 变更提交流程就是大家熟悉的git流程。

trans-unit.source: The character encoding of the data
trans-unit.target: 数据的字符编码

trans-unit.source: The chef executable is a command-line tool that does the following:
trans-unit.target: chef可执行文件是一个命令行工具,它可以完成以下工作。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client includes an option called local mode (--local-mode or -z), which runs the chef-client against the chef-repo on the local machine as if it were running against a Chef server. Local mode was added to the chef-client in the 11.8 release. If you are running that version of the chef-client (or later), you should consider using local mode instead of using chef-solo.
trans-unit.target: chef-client 包含一个称为本地模式的选项（ --local-mode 或 -z ），该选项针对本地计算机上的chef-repo运行chef-client，就像它在Chef服务器上运行一样。在11.8版本中，本地模式已添加到Chef-client。如果您正在运行该版本的chef-client（或更高版本），则应考虑使用本地模式而不是chef-solo。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client Run
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端运行

trans-unit.source: The chef-client accesses the Chef server from the node on which it’s installed to get configuration data, perform searches of historical chef-client run data, and then pull down the necessary configuration data. After the chef-client run is finished, the chef-client uploads updated run data to the Chef server as the updated node object.
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端从其安装节点访问Chef服务器，以获取配置数据，搜索历史Chef客户端运行数据，然后拉下必要的配置数据。Chef-Client运行结束后，Chef-Client将更新的运行数据作为更新的节点对象上传到Chef服务器。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client always checks the resource collection for the presence of exception and report handlers. If any are present, each one is processed appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端总是检查资源集合是否存在异常和报告处理程序。如果存在,则对每一个异常处理程序进行适当处理。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client asks the Chef server for a list of all cookbook files (including recipes, templates, resources, providers, attributes, libraries, and definitions) that will be required to do every action identified in the run-list for the rebuilt node object. The Chef server provides to the chef-client a list of all of those files. The chef-client compares this list to the cookbook files cached on the node (from previous chef-client runs), and then downloads a copy of every file that has changed since the previous chef-client run, along with any new files.
trans-unit.target: chef客户端向Chef服务器索取所有cookbook文件的列表(包括食谱、模板、资源、提供者、属性、库和定义),这些文件将被要求执行重建节点对象的运行列表中确定的每个操作。Chef服务器向chef-client提供了所有这些文件的列表。chef-client 将此列表与节点上缓存的 cookbook 文件(来自以前 chef-client 的运行)进行比较,然后下载自上次 chef-client 运行以来改变的每个文件的副本,以及任何新文件。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client authenticates to the Chef server using an RSA private key and the Chef server API. The name of the node is required as part of the authentication process to the Chef server. If this is the first chef-client run for a node, the chef-validator will be used to generate the RSA private key.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端使用RSA私钥和Chef服务器API对Chef服务器进行认证。节点的名称是需要作为Chef服务器认证过程的一部分。如果這是第一次為節點執行 chef-client,chef-validator 將會被用來產生 RSA 私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client automatically checks the configuration, node JSON, and the stored node on the Chef server to determine if Policyfile files are being used, and then automatically updates this flag. Default value: false.
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端自动检查配置，节点JSON和Chef服务器上的存储节点，以确定是否正在使用Policyfile文件，然后自动更新此标志。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client caches a template when it is first requested. On each subsequent request for that template, the chef-client compares that request to the template located on the Chef server. If the templates are the same, no transfer occurs.
trans-unit.target: 当第一次请求模板时,chef 客户端会将其缓存起来。在每次对该模板的后续请求中,chef客户端会将该请求与位于Chef服务器上的模板进行比较。如果模板相同,则不会发生传输。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client caches deployment actions as they are taken. In order for the chef-client to be able to apply a subsequent deployment action—rolling back a release using the :rollback action, for example—all related deployment actions must be contained within resource blocks that have the same name. This ensures that the chef-client will be able to find the correct deployment from within the cached deployment actions.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端在执行部署操作时会对其进行缓存。为了使Chef-client能够应用后续的部署操作（例如，使用 :rollback 操作回滚发行版），所有相关的部署操作必须包含在具有相同名称的资源块中。这确保了厨师客户端将能够从缓存的部署操作中找到正确的部署。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client can access any reflected or redirected registry key. The machine architecture of the system on which the chef-client is running is used as the default (non-redirected) location. Access to the SysWow64 location is redirected must be specified. Typically, this is only necessary to ensure compatibility with 32-bit applications that are running on a 64-bit operating system.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端可以访问任何反射或重定向的注册表项。运行chef-client的系统的计算机体系结构用作默认（非重定向）位置。必须指定对 SysWow64 位置的访问重定向。通常，仅在确保与在64位操作系统上运行的32位应用程序兼容时才需要这样做。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client can be installed on machines running Microsoft Windows in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端可以通过以下方式安装在运行Microsoft Windows的机器上。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client can be installed using an unattended bootstrap. This allows the chef-client to be installed from itself, without using SSH. For example, machines are often created using environments like AWS Auto Scaling, AWS CloudFormation, Rackspace Auto Scale, and PXE. In this scenario, using tooling for attended, single-machine installs like knife bootstrap or knife CLOUD_PLUGIN create is not practical because the machines are created automatically and someone cannot always be on-hand to initiate the bootstrap process.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用无人值守的引导程序来安装Chef-client。这允许在不使用SSH的情况下从其自身安装Chef-client。例如，通常使用诸如AWS Auto Scaling，AWS CloudFormation，Rackspace Auto Scale和PXE之类的环境来创建计算机。在这种情况下，使用工具进行有人参与的单机安装（例如， knife bootstrap 或 knife CLOUD_PLUGIN create 是不切实际的，因为这些机器是自动创建的，并且总不能有人亲自启动引导过程。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client can be run as a daemon. Use the chef-client cookbook to configure the chef-client as a daemon. Add the default recipe to a node’s run-list, and then use attributes in that cookbook to configure the behavior of the chef-client. For more information about these configuration options, see the chef-client cookbook repository on github.
trans-unit.target: Chef-client可以作为守护程序运行。使用chef-client cookbook 将chef-client配置为守护程序。将 default 配方添加到节点的运行列表，然后使用该食谱中的属性来配置Chef-Client的行为。有关这些配置选项的更多信息，请参见github上的chef-client cookbook存储库。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client can be run as a scheduled task. On the Microsoft Windows platform, a scheduled task provides more visibility, configurability, and reliability around log rotation and permissions, as compared to running the chef-client as a service. A scheduled task:
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端可以作为一个计划任务来运行。在Microsoft Windows平台上,与作为服务运行chef-client相比,计划任务提供了更多关于日志轮换和权限的可视性、可配置性和可靠性。一个预定任务。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client can be used to manage node data using the command line and JSON files. Each JSON file contains a hash, the elements of which are added as node attributes. In addition, the run_list setting allows roles and/or recipes to be added to the node.
trans-unit.target: Chef-client可用于使用命令行和JSON文件管理节点数据。每个JSON文件包含一个哈希，哈希的元素作为节点属性添加。另外， run_list 设置允许将角色和/或配方添加到节点。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client configures the system based on the information that has been collected. Each resource is executed in the order identified by the run-list, and then by the order in which each resource is listed in each recipe. Each resource in the resource collection is mapped to a provider. The provider examines the node, and then does the steps necessary to complete the action. And then the next resource is processed. Each action configures a specific part of the system. This process is also referred to as convergence. This is also referred to as the “execution phase”.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户根据已收集的信息配置系统。每个资源都按照运行列表标识的顺序执行，然后按照每个配方中每个资源的列出顺序执行。资源集合中的每个资源都映射到提供程序。提供程序检查该节点，然后执行完成操作所需的步骤。然后处理下一个资源。每个操作都会配置系统的特定部分。此过程也称为收敛。这也称为“执行阶段”。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client created its private key successfully.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端成功创建了自己的私钥。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client encountered an error and was unable to load node data from the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: chef客户端遇到一个错误,无法从Chef服务器加载节点数据。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client encountered an error and was unable to register with the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端遇到一个错误,无法在厨师服务器上注册。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client evaluates attributes in the order defined by the run-list, including any attributes that are in the run-list because of cookbook dependencies.
trans-unit.target: chef-client按照run-list定义的顺序来评估属性,包括任何因为食谱依赖性而出现在run-list中的属性。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client executable can be run as a daemon.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端的可执行文件可以作为守护进程运行。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client executable is run as a command-line tool.
trans-unit.target: chef-client可执行文件是作为命令行工具运行的。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client expands the run-list from the rebuilt node object, compiling a full and complete list of roles and recipes that will be applied to the node, placing the roles and recipes in the same exact order they will be applied. (The run-list is stored in each node object’s JSON file, grouped under run_list.)
trans-unit.target: Chef客户端从重建的节点对象扩展运行列表，编译将应用于该节点的角色和配方的完整列表，并将角色和配方以与应用相同的顺序放置。 （运行列表存储在每个节点对象的JSON文件中，并在 run_list 下分组。）

trans-unit.source: The chef-client failed to expand the run-list.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端未能扩展运行列表。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client failed to pull down the cookbook collection from the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端未能从Chef服务器上提取烹饪书集。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client gets process configuration data from the client.rb file on the node, and then gets node configuration data from Ohai. One important piece of configuration data is the name of the node, which is found in the node_name attribute in the client.rb file or is provided by Ohai. If Ohai provides the name of a node, it is typically the FQDN for the node, which is always unique within an organization.
trans-unit.target: Chef-client从节点上的client.rb文件获取流程配置数据，然后从Ohai获取节点配置数据。一项重要的配置数据是节点的名称，该名称可以在client.rb文件的 node_name 属性中找到或由Ohai提供。如果Ohai提供节点的名称，则通常是该节点的FQDN，在组织内始终是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client has the same system requirements on the AIX platform as any other platform, with the following notes:
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端在AIX平台上的系统要求与其他平台相同,但有以下说明。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client identifies each resource in the node object and builds the resource collection. Libraries are loaded first to ensure that all language extensions and Ruby classes are available to all resources. Next, attributes are loaded, followed by lightweight resources, and then all definitions (to ensure that any pseudo-resources within definitions are available). Finally, all recipes are loaded in the order specified by the expanded run-list. This is also referred to as the “compile phase”.
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端标识节点对象中的每个资源并构建资源集合。首先加载库，以确保所有资源都可以使用所有语言扩展和Ruby类。接下来，先加载属性，再加载轻量级资源，然后加载所有定义（以确保定义中的任何伪资源均可用）。最后，所有配方均按扩展运行清单指定的顺序加载。这也称为“编译阶段”。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client includes a stable version of Ruby as part of the omnibus installer. The path to this version of Ruby must be added to the $PATH environment variable and saved in the configuration file for the command shell (Bash, csh, and so on) that is used on the workstation. In a command window, type the following:
trans-unit.target: Chef-client包含一个稳定的Ruby版本，作为omnibus安装程序的一部分。此版本Ruby的路径必须添加到 $PATH 环境变量中，并保存在工作站上使用的命令外壳（Bash，csh等）的配置文件中。在命令窗口中，键入以下内容：

trans-unit.source: The chef-client includes two knife commands for managing SSL certificates:
trans-unit.target: 厨师客户端包括两个管理SSL证书的刀具命令。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client is attempting to create a private key with which to register to the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: chef 客户端正试图创建一个私钥,以便注册到 Chef 服务器。

trans-unit.source: The chef-client is attempting to load node data from the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: chef客户端正试图从Chef服务器加载节点数据。
